# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-104">중요한 정보 유형 엔터티 정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-105">준수 센터의 DLP (데이터 손실 방지)에는 DLP 정책에서 사용할 수 있는 중요 한 정보 유형이 많이 포함 되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready for you to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="18574-106">이 항목에서는 이러한 모든 중요한 정보 유형의 목록과 DLP 정책이 이러한 각 유형을 검색할 때 찾는 내용을 보여 줍니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-106">This topic lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="18574-107">중요한 정보 유형은 정규식이나 함수로 식별될 수 있는 패턴으로 정의됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-107">A sensitive information type is defined by a pattern that can be identified by a regular expression or a function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="18574-108">또한 키워드 및 체크섬과 같은 확증적인 증거를 사용하여 중요한 정보 유형을 식별할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-108">In addition, corroborative evidence such as keywords and checksums can be used to identify a sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="18574-109">이러한 평가 프로세스에서 신뢰 수준 및 근접성도 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-109">Confidence level and proximity are also used in the evaluation process.</span></span>
  
## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-110">ABA 라우팅 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-110">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-111">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-111">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-112">서식 있는 패턴 또는 서식 없는 패턴으로 표시될 수 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-112">9 digits which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-113">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-113">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-114">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-114">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-115">0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 또는 8로 시작하는 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-115">Four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-116">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-116">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-117">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-117">Four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-118">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-118">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-119">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-119">A digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-120">서식 없음: 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 또는 8로 시작 하는 9 개의 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-120">Unformatted: 9 consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-121">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-121">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-122">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-122">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-123">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-123">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-124">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-124">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-125">Func_aba_routing 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-125">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-126">Keyword_ABA_Routing의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-126">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- ABA Routing Number -->
<Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-146">아르헨티나 국가 id (DNI) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-146">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-147">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-147">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-148">마침표로 구분된 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-148">Eight digits separated by periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-149">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-149">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-150">8자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-150">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-151">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-151">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-152">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-152">A period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-153">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-153">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-154">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-154">A period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-155">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-155">Three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-156">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-156">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-157">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-157">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-158">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-158">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-159">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-159">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-160">정규식 Regex_argentina_national_id 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-160">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-161">Keyword_argentina_national_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-161">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-173">오스트레일리아 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-173">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-174">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-174">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-175">6-10자리 숫자(은행 지점 번호 포함 또는 제외)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-175">6-10 digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-176">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-176">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-177">계좌 번호는 6-10자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-177">Account number is 6-10 digits.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-178">호주 은행 지점 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-178">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-179">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-179">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-180">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-180">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-181">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-181">Three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-182">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-182">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-183">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-183">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-184">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-184">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-185">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-185">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-186">Regex_australia_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-186">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-187">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-187">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-188">Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-188">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-189">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-189">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-190">Regex_australia_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-190">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-191">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-191">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-199">bank address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-199">bank address</span></span>

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-207">오스트레일리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-207">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-208">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-208">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-209">9개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-209">Nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-210">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-210">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-211">9개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-211">Nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-212">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-212">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-213">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-213">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-214">5자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-214">Five digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-215">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-215">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-216">1-2개의 선택적 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-216">1-2 optional letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-217">4-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-217">4-9 digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-218">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-218">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-219">9자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-219">Nine digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-220">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-220">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-221">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-221">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-222">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-222">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-223">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-223">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-224">Regex_australia_drivers_license_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-224">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-225">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-225">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-226">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-226">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-326">오스트레일리아 의료 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-326">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-327">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-327">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-328">10-11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-328">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-329">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-329">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-330">10-11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-330">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-331">첫 번째 숫자는 2-6 범위에 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-331">First digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-332">9번째 숫자는 검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-332">Ninth digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-333">10번째 숫자는 문제 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-333">Tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-334">11번째 숫자(선택 사항)는 개인 번호입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-334">Eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-335">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-335">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-336">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-336">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-337">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-337">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-338">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-338">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-339">Func_australian_medical_account_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-339">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-340">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-340">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-341">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-341">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-342">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-342">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-343">Func_australian_medical_account_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-343">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-344">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-344">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Any minMatches="1">
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
     </Any>
  </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
  <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
     </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-356">오스트레일리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-356">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-357">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-357">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-358">문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-358">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-359">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-359">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-360">1개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-360">A letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-361">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-361">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-362">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-362">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-363">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-363">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-364">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-364">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-365">Regex_australia_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-365">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-366">Keyword_passport 또는 Keyword_australia_passport_number의 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-366">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-400">오스트레일리아 세금 파일 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-400">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-401">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-401">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-402">8-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-402">8-9 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-403">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-403">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-404">일반적으로 다음과 같이 공백과 함께 표시되는 8-9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-404">8-9 digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-405">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-405">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-406">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-406">An optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-407">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-407">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-408">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-408">An optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-409">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-409">2-3 digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-410">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-410">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-411">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-411">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-412">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-412">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-413">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-413">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-414">Func_australian_tax_file_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-414">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-415">Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number 또는 Keyword_number_exclusions의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-415">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-416">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-416">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-458">오스트리아 드라이버의 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-458">Austria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-459">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-459">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-460">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-460">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-461">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-461">Eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-462">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-462">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-463">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-463">Eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-464">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-464">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-465">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-465">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-466">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-466">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-467">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-467">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-468">정규식이 해당 `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-468">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-469">From 키워드를 `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-469">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-486">오스트리아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-486">Austria national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-487">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-487">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-488">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-488">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-489">문자, 숫자 및 특수 문자의 24 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-489">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-490">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-490">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-491">24 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-491">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="18574-492">22 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 숫자, 백슬래시, 슬래시 또는 더하기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-492">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-493">2 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 숫자, 백슬래시, 슬래시, 더하기 기호 또는 등호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-493">Two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-494">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-494">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-495">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-495">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-496">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-496">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-497">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-497">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-498">정규식이 해당 `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-498">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-499">From 키워드를 `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-499">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
<!-- EU austria_eu_national_id -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-503">national id</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-505">오스트리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-505">Austria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-506">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 sensitiveinformation type 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-506">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitiveinformation type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-507">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-507">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-508">1 개의 문자 다음에 선택적 공백, 일곱 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-508">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-509">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-509">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-510">한 글자, 일곱 자리 및 한 가지 공백 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-510">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-511">1개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-511">One letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-512">1 개의 공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-512">One space (optional)</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-513">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-513">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-514">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-514">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-515">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-515">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-516">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-516">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-517">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-517">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-518">정규식이 해당 `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-518">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-519">From 키워드를 `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-519">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-520">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-520">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-521">**Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-521">**Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

## <a name="austria-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-527">오스트리아 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-527">Austria social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-528">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-528">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-529">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-529">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-530">지정 된 형식의 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-530">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-531">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-531">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-532">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-532">10 digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="18574-533">일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-533">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-534">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-534">One check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-535">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-535">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-536">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-536">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-537">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-537">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-538">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-538">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-539">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-539">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-540">이 함수는 해당 `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-540">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-541">From 키워드를 `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-541">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-542">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-542">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-543">이 함수는 해당 `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-543">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-559">오스트리아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-559">Austria tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-560">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 ID 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-560">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Tax ID number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-561">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-561">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-562">하이픈 및 슬래시가 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-562">Nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-563">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-563">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-564">하이픈 및 슬래시가 있는 9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-564">Nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-565">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-565">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-566">하이픈 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-566">A hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-567">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-567">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-568">정방향 슬래시 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-568">A forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-569">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-569">Four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-570">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-570">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-571">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-571">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-572">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-572">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-573">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-573">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-574">이 함수는 해당 `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-574">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-575">From 키워드를 `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-575">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-576">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-576">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-577">이 함수는 해당 `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-577">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-600">Azure DocumentDB 인증 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-600">Azure DocumentDB Auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-601">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-601">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-602">아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 뒤에 오는 "DocumentDb" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-602">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-603">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-603">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-604">"DocumentDb" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-604">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-605">3-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-605">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-606">보다 큼 기호 (>), 등호 (=), 따옴표 (") 또는 아포스트로피 (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-606">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-607">86의 대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-607">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-608">두 개의 등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-608">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-609">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-609">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-610">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-610">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-611">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-611">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-612">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-612">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-613">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-613">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-614">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-614">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-615">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-615">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-616">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-616">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-617">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-617">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-618">극동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-618">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-619">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-619">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-620">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-620">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-621">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-621">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-622">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-622">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-623">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-623">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-624">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-624">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-625">testacs입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-625">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="18574-626">ccw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-626">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-627">s-int</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-627">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="18574-628">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-628">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-629">Azure IAAS 데이터베이스 연결 문자열 및 Azure SQL 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-629">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-630">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-630">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-631">"Server", "server" 또는 "data source" 라는 문자열은 "cloudapp. azure"를 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열을 따릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-631">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="18574-632">com "또는" cloudapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-632">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="18574-633">net "또는" 데이터베이스.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-633">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="18574-634">net "과 문자열" Password "또는" password "또는" pwd "가 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-634">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-635">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-635">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-636">문자열 "Server", "Server" 또는 "data source"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-636">The string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-637">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-637">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-638">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-638">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-639">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-639">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-640">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-640">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-641">문자열 "cloudapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-641">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="18574-642">com "," cloudapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-642">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="18574-643">net "또는" database.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-643">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="18574-644">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-644">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-645">1-300에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-645">Any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-646">문자열 "Password", "password" 또는 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-646">The string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-647">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-647">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-648">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-648">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-649">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-649">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-650">세미콜론 (;), 따옴표 (") 또는 아포스트로피 (')가 아닌 하나 이상의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-650">One or more characters that is not a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-651">세미콜론 (;), 따옴표 (") 또는 아포스트로피 (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-651">A semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-652">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-652">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-653">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-653">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-654">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-654">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-655">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-655">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-656">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-656">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-657">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-657">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-iot-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-672">Azure IoT connection 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-672">Azure IoT connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-673">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-673">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-674">문자열 "HostName" 뒤에 "azure-devices" 라는 문자열을 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 표시 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-674">The string "HostName" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="18574-675">net "및" SharedAccessKey "</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-675">net" and "SharedAccessKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-676">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-676">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-677">문자열 "HostName"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-677">The string "HostName"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-678">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-678">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-679">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-679">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-680">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-680">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-681">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-681">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-682">문자열 "azure-장치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-682">The string "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="18574-683">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-683">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-684">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-684">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-685">"SharedAccessKey" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-685">The string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-686">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-686">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-687">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-687">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-688">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-688">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-689">43의 대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-689">Any combination of 43 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-690">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-690">An equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-691">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-691">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-692">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-692">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-693">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-693">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-694">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-694">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-695">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-695">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml

<Entity id="0b34bec3-d5d6-4974-b7b0-dcdb5c90c29d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">

        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="18574-713">문자열 "userpwd =" 다음에 영숫자 문자열이 나옵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-713">The string "userpwd=" followed by an alphanumeric string.</span></span>

## <a name="azure-redis-cache-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-738">Azure Redis 캐시 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-738">Azure Redis cache connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-739">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-739">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-740">문자열 "redis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-740">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="18574-741">net "문자열" password "또는" pwd "를 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열을 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-741">net" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-742">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-742">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-743">문자열 "redis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-743">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="18574-744">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-744">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-745">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-745">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-746">문자열 "password" 또는 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-746">The string "password" or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-747">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-747">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-748">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-748">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-749">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-749">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-750">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 43 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-750">Any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-751">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-751">An equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-752">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-752">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-753">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-753">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-754">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-754">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-755">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-755">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-756">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-756">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-757">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-757">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Redis Cache Connection String-->
<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-758">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-758">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-759">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-759">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-760">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-760">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-761">극동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-761">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-762">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-762">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-763">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-763">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-764">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-764">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-765">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-765">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-766">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-766">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-767">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-767">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-768">testacs입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-768">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="18574-769">ccw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-769">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-770">s-int</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-770">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="18574-771">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-771">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-772">Azure SAS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-772">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-773">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-773">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-774">아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 뒤에 오는 문자열 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-774">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-775">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-775">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-776">문자열 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-776">The string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-777">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-777">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-778">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-778">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-779">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-779">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-780">대/소문자, 숫자 또는 백분율 기호 (%)가 43-53 자 사이의 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-780">Any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-781">문자열 "% 3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-781">The string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-782">소문자 또는 대문자, 숫자 또는 백분율 기호 (%)가 아닌 모든 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-782">Any character that is not a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-783">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-783">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-784">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-784">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-785">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-785">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-786">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-786">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-787">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureSAS 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-787">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-service-bus-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-788">Azure Service Bus 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-788">Azure Service Bus Connection String</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-789">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-789">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-790">문자열 "끝점" 뒤에 "servicebus" 라는 문자열을 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 나와 있는 문자 및 문자열이 표시 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-790">The string "EndPoint" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="18574-791">net "및" SharedAccesKey "을 차례로 누릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-791">net" and "SharedAccesKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-792">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-792">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-794">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-794">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-795">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-795">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-796">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-796">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-797">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-797">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-798">문자열 "servicebus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-798">The string "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="18574-799">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-799">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-800">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-800">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-801">"SharedAccessKey" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-801">The string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-802">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-802">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-803">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-803">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-804">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-804">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-805">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 43 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-805">Any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-806">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-806">An equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-807">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-807">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-808">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-808">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-809">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-809">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-810">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-810">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-811">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-811">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-812">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-812">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-818">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-818">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-819">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-819">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-820">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-820">onebox</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-827">Azure 저장소 계정 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-827">Azure Storage Account Key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-828">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-828">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-829">"DefaultEndpointsProtocol" 문자열은 "AccountKey" 문자열을 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열을 따릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-829">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "AccountKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-830">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-830">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-831">문자열 "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-831">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-832">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-832">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-833">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-833">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-834">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-834">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-835">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-835">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-836">문자열 "AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-836">The string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-837">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-837">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-838">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-838">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-839">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-839">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-840">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 86 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-840">Any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-841">두 개의 등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-841">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-842">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-842">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-843">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-843">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-844">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-844">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-845">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-845">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-846">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-846">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-847">정규식 CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-847">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-848">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-848">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
