## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-866">Azure 저장소 계정 키 (일반)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-866">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-867">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-867">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-868">아래 패턴에 윤곽선이 있는 문자 앞 이나 뒤에 오는 86 문자의 대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)의 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-868">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-869">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-869">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-870">보다 큼 기호 (>), 아포스트로피 ('), 등호 (=), 따옴표 (") 또는 숫자 기호 (#) 0-1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-870">0-1 of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-871">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 86 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-871">Any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-872">두 개의 등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-872">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-873">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-873">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-874">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-874">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-875">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-875">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-876">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-876">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-877">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-877">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-878">벨기에 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-878">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-879">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-879">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-880">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-880">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-881">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-881">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-882">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-882">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-883">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-883">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-884">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-884">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-885">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-885">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-886">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-886">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-887">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-887">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-888">정규식이 해당 `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-888">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-889">From 키워드를 `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-889">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-911">벨기에 국가 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-911">Belgium national number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-912">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-912">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-913">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-913">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-914">11자리 숫자와 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-914">11 digits plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-915">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-915">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-916">11자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-916">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-917">생년월일을 나타내는 YY.MM.DD 형식의 6자리 숫자와 마침표 2개 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-917">Six digits and two periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-918">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-918">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-919">세 개의 순차적 숫자(남성의 경우 홀수, 여성의 경우 짝수) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-919">Three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-920">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-920">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-921">검사 숫자에 해당하는 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-921">Two digits that are a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-922">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-922">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-923">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-923">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-924">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-924">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-925">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-925">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-926">Func_belgium_national_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-926">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-927">Keyword_belgium_national_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-927">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-928">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-928">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
  <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-987">벨기에 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-987">Belgium passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-988">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-988">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-989">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-989">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-990">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 2 개 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-990">Two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-991">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-991">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-992">2 개 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-992">Two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-993">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-993">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-994">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-994">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-995">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-995">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-996">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-996">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-997">정규식이 해당 `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-997">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-998">From 키워드를 `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-998">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium__eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-999">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-999">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1000">**Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1000">**Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number**</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1001">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1001">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1002">벨기에 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1002">belgian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1003">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1003">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1004">고 대/ort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1004">paspoort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1005">paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1005">paspoortnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1006">reisepass kein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1006">reisepass kein</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1007">reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1007">reisepass</span></span>

## <a name="belgium-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1008">벨기에 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1008">Belgium social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-1009">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1009">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1010">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1010">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1011">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1011">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1012">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1012">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1013">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1013">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1014">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1014">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1015">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1015">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1016">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1016">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1017">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1017">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1018">이 함수는 해당 `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1018">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1019">From 키워드를 `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1019">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-1020">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1020">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1021">이 함수는 해당 `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1021">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1041">벨기에 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1041">Belgium tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-1042">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 Identificaiton 번호 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1042">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Tax Identificaiton Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1043">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1043">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1044">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1044">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1045">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1045">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1046">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1046">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1047">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1047">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1048">"0" 또는 "1"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1048">A "0" or "1"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1049">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1049">One digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1050">"0" 또는 "1" 또는 "2" 또는 "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1050">A "0" or "1" or "2" or "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1051">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1051">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1052">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1052">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1053">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1053">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1054">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1054">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1055">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1055">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1056">정규식이 해당 `Regex_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1056">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1057">From 키워드를 `Keywords_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1057">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1116">브라질 CPF 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1116">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1117">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1117">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1118">서식이 있거나 서식이 없을 수 있는 검사 숫자를 포함하는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1118">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1119">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1119">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1120">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1120">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1121">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1121">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1122">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1122">A period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1123">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1123">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1124">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1124">A period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1125">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1125">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1126">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1126">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1127">검사 숫자에 해당하는 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1127">Two digits which are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1128">서식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1128">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1129">마지막 2자리 숫자가 검사 숫자인 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1129">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1130">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1130">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1131">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1131">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1132">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1132">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1133">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1133">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1134">Func_brazil_cpf 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1134">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1135">Keyword_brazil_cpf에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1135">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1136">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1136">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1137">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1137">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1138">Func_brazil_cpf 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1138">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1139">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1139">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1151">브라질 legal 엔티티 번호 (CNPJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1151">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1152">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1152">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1153">등록 번호, 지점 번호, 검사 숫자 및 구분 기호를 포함하는 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1153">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1154">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1154">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-1155">14자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1155">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1156">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1156">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1157">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1157">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1158">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1158">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1159">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1159">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1160">3자리 숫자(처음 8자리 숫자는 등록 번호임) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1160">Three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1161">정방향 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1161">A forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1162">4자리 지점 번호 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1162">Four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1163">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1163">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1164">검사 숫자에 해당하는 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1164">Two digits which are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1165">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1165">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1166">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1166">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1167">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1167">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1168">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1168">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1169">Func_brazil_cnpj 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1169">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1170">Keyword_brazil_cnpj에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1170">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1171">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1171">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1172">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1172">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1173">Func_brazil_cnpj 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1173">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1174">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1174">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1196">브라질 국립 식별 카드 (RG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1196">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1197">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1197">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1198">Registro Geral (이전 형식): 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1198">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1199">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (새 형식): 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1199">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1200">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1200">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1201">Registro Geral(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1201">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1202">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1202">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1203">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1203">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1204">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1204">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1205">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1205">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1206">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1206">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1207">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1207">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1208">검사 숫자에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1208">One digit which is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1209">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1209">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1210">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1210">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1211">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1211">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1212">검사 숫자에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1212">One digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1213">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1213">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1214">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1214">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1215">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1215">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1216">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1216">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1217">Func_brazil_rg 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1217">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1218">Keyword_brazil_rg에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1218">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1219">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1219">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1220">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1220">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1221">Func_brazil_rg 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1221">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1222">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1222">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
<Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1224">Keyword_brazil_rg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1224">Keyword_brazil_rg</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1229">registro de Iidentidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1229">registro de Iidentidade</span></span>

## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1233">불가리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1233">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-1234">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1234">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1235">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1235">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1236">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1236">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1237">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1237">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1238">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1238">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1239">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1239">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1240">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1240">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1241">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1241">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1242">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1242">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1243">정규식이 해당 `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1243">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1244">From 키워드를 `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1244">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
             <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern> 
</Entity>    
```

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1246">**Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1246">**Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1256">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1256">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1257">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1257">driving license number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1261">сумпс</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1261">сумпс</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1262">шофьорска книжка</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1262">шофьорска книжка</span></span>

## <a name="bulgaria-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1263">불가리아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1263">Bulgaria national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-1264">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1264">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1265">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1265">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1266">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1266">Ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1267">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1267">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1268">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1268">Ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1269">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1269">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1270">출생 순서에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1270">Two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1271">성별에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자와이에 해당 하는 짝수 자리 숫자 및 암의 홀수 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1271">One digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1272">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1272">One check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1273">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1273">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1274">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1274">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1275">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1275">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1276">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1276">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1277">이 함수는 해당 `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1277">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1278">From 키워드를 `Keywords_bulgaria_national_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1278">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_national_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1279">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1279">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1280">이 함수는 해당 `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1280">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1325">불가리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1325">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-1326">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1326">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1327">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1327">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1328">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1328">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1329">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1329">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="18574-1330">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1330">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1331">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1331">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1332">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1332">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1333">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1333">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1334">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1334">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1335">정규식이 해당 `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1335">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1336">From 키워드를 `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1336">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1337">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1337">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1338">**Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1338">**Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number**</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1339">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1339">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1340">불가리아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1340">bulgarian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1341">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1341">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1342">номер на паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1342">номер на паспорта</span></span>

## <a name="bulgaria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1343">불가리아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1343">Bulgaria tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-1344">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1344">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1345">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1345">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1346">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1346">Ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1347">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1347">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1348">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1348">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1349">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1349">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1350">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1350">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1351">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1351">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1352">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1352">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1353">이 함수는 해당 `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1353">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1354">From 키워드를 `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1354">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1355">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1355">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1356">이 함수는 해당 `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1356">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
 <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1401">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1401">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1402">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1402">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1403">7 또는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1403">Seven or twelve digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1404">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1404">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1405">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호는 7 또는 12자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1405">A Canada Bank Account Number is seven or twelve digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1406">캐나다 은행 계좌 송금 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1406">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1407">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1407">Five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1408">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1408">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1409">3 자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1409">Three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1410">"0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1410">A zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1411">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1411">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1412">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1412">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1413">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1413">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1414">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1414">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1415">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1415">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1416">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1416">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1417">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1417">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1418">Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1418">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1419">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1419">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1420">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1420">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1421">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1421">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1445">캐나다 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1445">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1446">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1446">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1447">지역마다 다름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1447">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1448">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1448">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1449">앨버타, 브리티시 콜롬비아, 매니토바, 뉴브런즈윅, 뉴펀들랜드/래브라도, 노바스코샤, 온타리오, 프린스에드워드아일랜드, 퀘벡 및 서스캐처원을 포함하는 다양한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1449">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1450">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1450">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1451">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1451">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1452">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1452">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1453">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1453">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1454">Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1454">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1455">Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1455">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1456">Keyword_canada_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1456">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_quebec_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_quebec_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_saskatchewan_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_saskatchewan_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
```

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1597">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1597">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1598">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1598">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1599">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1599">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1600">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1600">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1601">Regex_canada_health_service_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1601">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1602">Keyword_canada_health_service_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1602">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1614">캐나다 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1614">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1615">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1615">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1616">2개의 대문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1616">Two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1617">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1617">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1618">2개의 대문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1618">Two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1619">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1619">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1620">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1620">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1621">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1621">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1622">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1622">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1623">Regex_canada_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1623">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1624">Keyword_canada_passport_number 또는 Keyword_passport의 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1624">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1654">캐나다 PHIN (개인 건강 식별 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1654">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1655">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1655">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1656">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1656">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1657">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1657">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1658">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1658">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1659">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1659">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1660">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1660">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1661">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1661">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1662">DLP 정책은 300 Regex_canada_phin 문자 근사에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾는 경우이 유형의 중요 한 정보를 검색 한다는 것을 75% 확신 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1662">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-1663">Keyword_canada_phin 또는 Keyword_canada_provinces에서 키워드가 두 개 이상 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1663">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found..</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1696">캐나다 사회 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1696">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1697">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1697">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1698">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백을 포함하는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1698">Nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1699">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1699">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1700">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1700">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1701">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1701">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1702">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1702">A hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1703">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1703">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1704">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1704">A hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1705">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1705">Three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1706">서식 없음: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1706">Unformatted: Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1707">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1707">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1708">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1708">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1709">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1709">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1710">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1710">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1711">Func_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1711">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1712">2개 이상의 다음 항목 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1712">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="18574-1713">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1713">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="18574-1714">Keyword_sin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1714">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="18574-1715">Func_eu_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1715">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1716">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1716">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1717">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1717">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1718">Func_unformatted_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1718">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1719">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1719">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1720">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1720">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1745">칠레 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1745">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1746">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1746">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1747">7-8 자리 숫자와 구분 기호 확인 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1747">7-8 digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1748">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1748">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1749">7-8자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1749">7-8 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1750">1-2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1750">1-2 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1751">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1751">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1752">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1752">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1753">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1753">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1754">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1754">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1755">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1755">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1756">검사 숫자에 해당하는 1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1756">One digit or letter (not case sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1757">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1757">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1758">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1758">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1759">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1759">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1760">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1760">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1761">Func_chile_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1761">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1762">Keyword_chile_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1762">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1763">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1763">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1764">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1764">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1765">Func_chile_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1765">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1766">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1766">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1781">중국의 중국 id 카드 (PRC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1781">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1782">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1782">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1783">18자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1783">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1784">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1784">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1785">18자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1785">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1786">주소 코드에 해당하는 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1786">Six digits which are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1787">생년월일에 해당하는 YYYYMMDD 형식의 8자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1787">Eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1788">주문 코드에 해당하는 3자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1788">Three digits which are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1789">검사 숫자에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1789">One digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1790">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1790">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1791">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1791">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1792">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1792">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1793">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1793">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1794">Func_china_resident_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1794">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1795">Keyword_china_resident_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1795">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1796">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1796">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1797">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1797">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1798">Func_china_resident_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1798">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1799">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1799">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
