## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1812">신용 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1812">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1813">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1813">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1814">서식이 있거나 서식이 없을 수 있는 (dddddddddddddddd), Luhn 테스트를 통과 해야 하는 16 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1814">14 to 16 digits which can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and which must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1815">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1815">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1816">Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, 상품권 및 식사권을 비롯하여 전 세계 모든 주요 브랜드 카드를 검색하는 매우 복잡하고 강력한 패턴입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1816">Very complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1817">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1817">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1818">있음(Luhn 체크섬)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1818">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-1819">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1819">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1820">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1820">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1821">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1821">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1822">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1822">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="18574-1823">Keyword_cc_verification의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1823">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="18574-1824">Keyword_cc_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1824">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="18574-1825">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1825">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1826">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1826">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-1827">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1827">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1828">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1828">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-1829">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-1829">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2035">크로아티아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2035">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-2036">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2036">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2037">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2037">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2038">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2038">Eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2039">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2039">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2040">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2040">Eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2041">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2041">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2042">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2042">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2043">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2043">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2044">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2044">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2045">정규식이 해당 `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2045">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2046">From 키워드를 `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2046">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2047">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2047">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2048">**Keywords_croatia_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2048">**Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2051">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2051">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2052">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2052">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2053">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2053">drivers lic.</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2062">크로아티아 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2062">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-2063">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2063">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2064">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2064">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2065">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2065">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2066">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2066">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2067">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2067">Nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2068">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2068">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2069">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2069">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2070">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2070">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2071">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2071">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2072">Func_croatia_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2072">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2073">Keyword_croatia_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2073">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2104">크로아티아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2104">Croatia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-2105">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2105">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2106">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2106">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2107">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2107">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2108">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2108">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="18574-2109">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2109">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2110">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2110">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2111">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2111">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2112">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2112">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2113">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2113">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2114">정규식이 해당 `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2114">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2115">From 키워드를 `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2115">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2116">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2116">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2117">**Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2117">**Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2118">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2118">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2119">크로아티아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2119">croatian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2120">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2120">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2121">broj putovnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2121">broj putovnice</span></span>

   
## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2122">크로아티아 OIB (개인 식별) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2122">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2123">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2123">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2124">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2124">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2125">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2125">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2126">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2126">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2127">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2127">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2128">최종 자릿수는 국제 데이터 교환 목적을 위한 검사 숫자 이며, HR는 11 자리 숫자 앞에 추가 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2128">Final digit is a check digit For the purposes of international data exchange, the letters HR are added preceding the eleven digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2129">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2129">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2130">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2130">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2131">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2131">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2132">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2132">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2133">Func_croatia_oib_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2133">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2134">Keyword_croatia_oib_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2134">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_oib_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2135">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2135">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2136">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2136">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2137">Func_croatia_oib_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2137">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2138">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2138">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
<Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_oib_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2139">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2139">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_croatia_oib_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2140">Keyword_croatia_oib_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2140">Keyword_croatia_oib_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2143">OIB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2143">OIB</span></span> 

## <a name="croatia-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2144">크로아티아 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 하는 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2144">Croatia social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-2145">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2145">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2146">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2146">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2147">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2147">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2148">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2148">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="18574-2149">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2149">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2150">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2150">Ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2151">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2151">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2152">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2152">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2153">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2153">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2154">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2154">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2155">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2155">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2156">이 함수는 해당 `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2156">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2157">From 키워드를 `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2157">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-2158">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2158">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2159">이 함수는 해당 `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2159">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2160">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2160">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2161">Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2161">Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2162">개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2162">personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2163">마스터 시민 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2163">master citizen number</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2176">크로아티아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2176">Croatia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-2177">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 Identificaiton 번호 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2177">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identificaiton Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2178">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2178">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2179">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2179">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2180">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2180">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2181">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2181">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2182">임의로 선택한 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2182">Ten digits, randomly chosen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2183">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2183">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2184">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2184">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2185">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2185">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2186">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2186">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2187">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2187">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2188">이 함수는 해당 `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2188">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2189">From 키워드를 `Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2189">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-2190">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2190">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2191">이 함수는 해당 `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2191">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2222">키프로스 드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2222">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-2223">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2223">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2224">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2224">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2225">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2225">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2226">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2226">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2227">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2227">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2228">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2228">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2229">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2229">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2230">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2230">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2231">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2231">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2232">정규식이 해당 `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2232">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2233">From 키워드를 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2233">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2235">**Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2235">**Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2244">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2244">driver's licence number</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2248">키프로스 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2248">Cyprus national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-2249">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2249">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2250">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2250">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2251">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2251">Ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2252">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2252">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="18574-2253">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2253">Ten digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2254">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2254">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2255">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2255">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2256">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2256">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2257">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2257">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2258">정규식이 해당 `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2258">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2259">From 키워드를 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2259">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2260">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2260">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2261">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2261">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2262">id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2262">id card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2263">id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2263">identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2264">kimlik karti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2264">kimlik karti</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2265">국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2265">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2266">개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2266">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2267">ταυτοτητασ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2267">ταυτοτητασ</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2268">키프로스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2268">Cyprus passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-2269">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2269">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2270">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2270">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2271">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 1 개 문자 다음에 6-8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2271">One letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2272">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2272">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2273">한 문자 다음에 6 ~ 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2273">One letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2274">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2274">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2275">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2275">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2276">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2276">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2277">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2277">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2278">정규식이 해당 `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2278">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2279">From 키워드를 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2279">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2280">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2280">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2281">**Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2281">**Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2282">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2282">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2283">키프로스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2283">cyprus passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2284">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2284">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2285">αριθμό διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2285">αριθμό διαβατηρίου</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2286">키프로스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2286">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-2287">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2287">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2288">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2288">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2289">지정 된 패턴에서 8 자리 및 1 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2289">Eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2290">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2290">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2291">8 자리 숫자와 1 개 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2291">Eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="18574-2292">"0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2292">A "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2293">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2293">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2294">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2294">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2295">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2295">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2296">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2296">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2297">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2297">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2298">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2298">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2299">이 함수는 해당 `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2299">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2300">From 키워드를 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2300">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-2301">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2301">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2302">이 함수는 해당 `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2302">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2331">체코어 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2331">Czech driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-2332">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2332">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2333">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2333">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2334">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2334">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2335">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2335">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2336">8 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2336">Eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2337">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2337">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2338">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2338">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2339">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2339">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2340">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2340">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2341">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2341">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2342">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2342">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2343">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2343">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2344">정규식이 해당 `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2344">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2345">From 키워드를 `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2345">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2346">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2346">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2347">**Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2347">**Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2350">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2350">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2351">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2351">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2352">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2352">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2353">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2353">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2354">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2354">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2355">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2355">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2356">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2356">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2357">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2357">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2358">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2358">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2359">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2359">driving license number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2361">řidičský prúkaz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2361">řidičský prúkaz</span></span>

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2362">체코어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2362">Czech passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-2363">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2363">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2364">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2364">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2365">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2365">Eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2366">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2366">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2367">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2367">Eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2368">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2368">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2369">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2369">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2370">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2370">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2371">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2371">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2372">정규식이 해당 `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2372">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2373">From 키워드를 `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2373">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2374">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2374">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2375">**Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2375">**Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2376">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2376">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2377">체코어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2377">czech passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2378">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2378">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2379">cestovní pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2379">cestovní pas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2380">pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2380">pas</span></span>

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2381">체코어 개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2381">Czech personal identity number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-2382">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 번들에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2382">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National identification number bundle and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2383">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2383">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2384">선택적 슬래시 (이전 형식)가 있는 9 자리 숫자와 슬래시 (새 형식)가 있는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2384">Nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) 10 digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2385">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2385">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2386">9 자리 숫자 (이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2386">Nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2387">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2387">Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2388">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2388">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2389">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2389">Six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2390">정방향 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2390">A forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2391">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2391">Three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2392">10 자리 숫자 (새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2392">10 digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2393">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2393">10 digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2394">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2394">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2395">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2395">Six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2396">정방향 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2396">A forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2397">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2397">Four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2398">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2398">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2399">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2399">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2400">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2400">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2401">DLP 정책은 300 Func_czech_id_card 문자에 근접 한 경우에는이 유형의 중요 한 정보를 검색 하는 것으로 85% 확신 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2401">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-2402">Keyword_czech_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2402">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-2403">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2403">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
<Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497"      patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
      <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2404">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2404">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2405">체코어 개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2405">czech personal identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2406">Rodné číslo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2406">Rodné číslo</span></span>



## <a name="czech-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2407">체코어 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2407">Czech social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-2408">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2408">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2409">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2409">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2410">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 및 백슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2410">Ten digits and a backslash in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2411">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2411">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2412">10 자리 숫자와 백슬래시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2412">Ten digits and a backslash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2413">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2413">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD):</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2414">백슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2414">A backslash</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2415">같은 날짜에 태어난 사람을 구분 하는 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2415">Three digits that correspond to a serial number that separates persons born on the same date</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2416">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2416">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2417">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2417">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2418">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2418">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2419">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2419">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2420">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2420">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2421">이 함수는 해당 `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2421">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2422">From 키워드를 `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2422">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-2423">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2423">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2424">이 함수는 해당 `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2424">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2425">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2425">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2426">Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2426">Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2427">돌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2427">birth number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2429">개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2429">personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2430">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2430">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2431">nationalnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2431">nationalnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2432">ssn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2432">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2433">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2433">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2434">국가 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2434">national number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2435">개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2435">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2436">personalidnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2436">personalidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2437">rč</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2437">rč</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2438">rodné číslo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2438">rodné číslo</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2439">rodne cislo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2439">rodne cislo</span></span>

## <a name="czech-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2440">체코어 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2440">Czech tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-2441">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2441">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2442">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2442">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2443">선택적 백슬래시가 있는 9 자리 또는 10 진수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2443">Nine or ten digits with an optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2444">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2444">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2445">선택적 backslashl이 있는 아홉 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2445">Nine or ten digits with an optional backslashl:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2446">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2446">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2447">백슬래시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2447">A backslash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2448">3 ~ 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2448">Three or four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2449">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2449">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2450">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2450">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2451">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2451">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2452">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2452">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2453">정규식이 해당 `Regex_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2453">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2454">From 키워드를 `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2454">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2493">덴마크 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2493">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-2494">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2494">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2495">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2495">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2496">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2496">Eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2497">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2497">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2498">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2498">Eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2499">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2499">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2500">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2500">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2501">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2501">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2502">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2502">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2503">정규식이 해당 `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2503">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2504">From 키워드를 `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2504">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2505">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2505">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2506">**Keywords_denmark_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2506">**Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2507">| dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2507">|dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2508">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2508">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2509">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2509">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2510">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2510">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2511">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2511">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2512">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2512">drivers license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2514">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2514">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2515">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2515">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2516">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2516">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2517">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2517">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2521">덴마크 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2521">Denmark passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-2522">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2522">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2523">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2523">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2524">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2524">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2525">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2525">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="18574-2526">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2526">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2527">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2527">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2528">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2528">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2529">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2529">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2530">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2530">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2531">정규식이 해당 `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2531">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2532">From 키워드를 `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2532">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2533">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2533">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2534">**Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2534">**Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2535">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2535">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2536">덴마크어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2536">danish passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2537">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2537">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2538">pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2538">pas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2539">pasnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2539">pasnummer</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2540">덴마크 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2540">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-2541">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2541">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2542">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2542">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2543">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2543">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2544">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2544">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2545">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2545">10 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2546">생년월일에 해당하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2546">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2547">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2547">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2548">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2548">Four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2549">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2549">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2550">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2550">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2551">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2551">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2552">DLP 정책은 300 Regex_denmark_id 문자 근사에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾는 경우이 유형의 중요 한 정보를 검색 한다는 것을 75% 확신 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2552">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The regular expression Regex_denmark_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-2553">Keyword_denmark_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2553">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-2554">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2554">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
<Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2555">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2555">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_denmark_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2556">Keyword_denmark_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2556">Keyword_denmark_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2557">centrale personregister</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2557">centrale personregister</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2558">civilt registreringssystem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2558">civilt registreringssystem</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2559">cpr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2559">cpr</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2560">cpr #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2560">cpr#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2561">gesundheitskarte nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2561">gesundheitskarte nummer</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2606">덴마크 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2606">Denmark social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-2607">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2607">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2608">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2608">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2609">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 및 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2609">Ten digits and a hyphen in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2610">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2610">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2611">10 자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2611">Ten digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2612">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2612">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2613">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2613">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2614">일련 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2614">Four digits that correspond to a sequence number</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2615">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2615">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2616">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2616">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2617">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2617">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2618">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2618">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2619">이 함수는 해당 `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2619">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2620">From 키워드를 `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2620">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-2621">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2621">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2622">이 함수는 해당 `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2622">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```
