## <a name="denmark-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2636">덴마크 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2636">Denmark tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-2637">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2637">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2638">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2638">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2639">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2639">Ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2640">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2640">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2641">Hyphenl를 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2641">Ten digits containing a hyphenl:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="18574-2642">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2642">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2643">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2643">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2644">첫 번째 숫자가 출생 세기에 해당 하 고 마지막 숫자가 개별 성별에 해당 하는 시퀀스 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자 (남성의 경우 홀수 및 암에도 해당)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2644">Four digits that correspond to a sequence number where the first digit corresponds to the century of birth and the last digit corresponds to the individual's gender (odd for male and even for female)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2645">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2645">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2646">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2646">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2647">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2647">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2648">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2648">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2649">이 함수는 해당 `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2649">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2650">From 키워드를 `Keywords_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2650">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-2651">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2651">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2652">이 함수는 해당 `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2652">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern> 
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2704">DEA (약품 집행 기관) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2704">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2705">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2705">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2706">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2706">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2707">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2707">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2708">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2708">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2709">등록 코드에 해당하는 abcdefghjklmnprstux 중 한 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2709">One letter (not case sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2710">등록자 성의 첫 문자에 해당하는 한 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2710">One letter (not case sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2711">검사 숫자의 마지막 7개 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2711">Seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2712">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2712">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2713">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2713">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2714">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2714">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2715">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2715">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2716">Func_dea_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2716">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2717">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2717">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- DEA Number -->
<Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2718">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2718">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2719">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2719">None</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2720">에스토니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2720">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-2721">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2721">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2722">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2722">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2723">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2723">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2724">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2724">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2725">2 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2725">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="18574-2726">문자 "ET" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2726">The letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2727">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2727">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2728">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2728">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2729">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2729">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2730">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2730">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2731">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2731">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2732">정규식이 해당 `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2732">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2733">From 키워드를 `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2733">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2734">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2734">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2735">**Keywords_estonia_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2735">**Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2736">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2736">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2737">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2737">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2738">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2738">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2739">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2739">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2740">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2740">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2741">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2741">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2742">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2742">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2743">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2743">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2744">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2744">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2745">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2745">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2746">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2746">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2747">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2747">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2748">permis de conduire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2748">permis de conduire</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2749">에스토니아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2749">Estonia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-2750">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2750">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2751">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2751">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2752">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2752">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2753">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2753">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2754">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2754">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2755">출생의 성별 및 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (예: 1-2 암, 수, 19th 세기, 3-4:20th 세기, 5-6 = 21 세기)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2755">One digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2756">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2756">Six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2757">같은 날짜에 태어난 사람을 구분 하는 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2757">Three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2758">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2758">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2759">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2759">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2760">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2760">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2761">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2761">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2762">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2762">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2763">이 함수는 해당 `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2763">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2764">From 키워드를 `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2764">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-2765">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2765">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2766">이 함수는 해당 `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2766">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
</Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2799">에스토니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2799">Estonia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-2800">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2800">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2801">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2801">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2802">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 1 개 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2802">One letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2803">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2803">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2804">1 개의 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2804">One letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2805">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2805">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2806">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2806">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2807">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2807">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2808">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2808">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2809">정규식이 해당 `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2809">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2810">From 키워드를 `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2810">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2811">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2811">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2812">**Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2812">**Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2813">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2813">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2814">에스토니아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2814">estonian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2815">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2815">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2816">eesti kodaniku pass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2816">eesti kodaniku pass</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2817">에스토니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2817">Estonia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-2818">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2818">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2819">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2819">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2820">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2820">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2821">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2821">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2822">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2822">11 digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="18574-2823">성별에 해당 하는 숫자와 홀수로 해당 하 고, 홀수를 지정 하 여 19th 세기에 대해 1, 2를 나타내는 숫자입니다. 3, 20th 세기에 대해 4를 적용 합니다. 21 세기에 대해 5, 6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2823">One digit that corresponds to gender and century of birth where an odd number indicates male and the even number indicates female as follows: 1, 2 for the 19th century; 3, 4 for the 20th century; and 5, 6 for the 21st century</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2824">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2824">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2825">같은 날짜에 태어난 사람을 구분 하는 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2825">Three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2826">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2826">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2827">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2827">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2828">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2828">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2829">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2829">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2830">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2830">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2831">이 함수는 해당 `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2831">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2832">From 키워드를 `Keywords_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2832">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-2833">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2833">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2834">이 함수는 해당 `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2834">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2867">EU 직불 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2867">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2868">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2868">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2869">16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2869">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2870">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2870">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2871">매우 복잡하고 강력한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2871">Very complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2872">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2872">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2873">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2873">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-2874">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2874">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-2875">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2875">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2876">Func_eu_debit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2876">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2877">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2877">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="18574-2878">Keyword_eu_debit_card의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2878">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="18574-2879">Keyword_card_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2879">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="18574-2880">Keyword_card_security_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2880">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="18574-2881">Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2881">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="18574-2882">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2882">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-2883">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-2883">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3329">핀란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3329">Finland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-3330">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3330">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3331">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3331">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3332">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3332">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3333">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3333">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3334">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3334">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="18574-3335">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3335">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3336">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3336">A hyphen</span></span>
-  <span data-ttu-id="18574-3337">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3337">Four digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3338">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3338">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3339">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3339">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3340">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3340">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3341">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3341">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3342">정규식이 해당 `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3342">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3343">From 키워드를 `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3343">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3344">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3344">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3345">**Keywords_finland_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3345">**Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3346">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3346">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3347">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3347">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3348">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3348">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3349">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3349">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3350">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3350">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3351">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3351">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3352">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3352">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3353">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3353">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3354">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3354">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3355">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3355">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3356">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3356">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3357">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3357">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3358">ajokortti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3358">ajokortti</span></span>

## <a name="finland-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3359">핀란드 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3359">Finland national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-3360">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3360">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3361">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3361">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3362">세기를 나타내는 6자리 숫자와 문자, 3자리 숫자와 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3362">Six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3363">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3363">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3364">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3364">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3365">생년월일에 해당하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3365">Six digits in the format format DDMMYY which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3366">세기 표시('-', '+' 또는 'a')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3366">Century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3367">3자리 개인 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3367">Three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3368">검사 숫자에 해당하는 1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3368">A digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3369">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3369">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3370">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3370">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3371">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3371">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3372">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3372">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3373">Func_finnish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3373">The function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3374">Keyword_finnish_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3374">A keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3375">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3375">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finnish National ID-->
<Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3424">핀란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3424">Finland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-3425">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3425">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3426">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3426">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-3427">9개의 문자와 숫자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3427">Combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3428">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3428">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-3429">9 개의 문자 및 숫자 조합: 2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3429">Combination of nine letters and digits: Two letters (not case sensitive) Seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3430">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3430">Checksum</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-3431">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3431">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3432">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3432">Definition</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-3433">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3433">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3434">정규식 Regex_finland_passport_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3434">The regular expression Regex_finland_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3435">Keyword_finland_passport_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3435">A keyword from Keyword_finland_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3436">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3436">Keywords</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3437">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3437">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3438">여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3438">Passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3439">에이 si</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3439">Passi</span></span>

## <a name="finland-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3440">핀란드 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3440">Finland social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-3441">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3441">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3442">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3442">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3443">지정 된 형식의 11 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3443">An 11-character combination in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3444">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3444">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3445">다음은 지정 된 형식의 11 자 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3445">An 11-character combination in the specified format:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="18574-3446">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3446">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3447">다음 중 하나의 인스턴스에 대해 다음을 수행 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3447">One instance of one of the following:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="18574-3448">더하기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3448">Plus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="18574-3449">빼기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3449">Minus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="18574-3450">문자 "A" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3450">The letter "A" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3451">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3451">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3452">1 개의 문자 또는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3452">One letter or one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3453">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3453">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3454">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3454">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3455">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3455">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3456">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3456">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3457">이 함수는 해당 `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3457">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3458">From 키워드를 `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3458">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-3459">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3459">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3460">이 함수는 해당 `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3460">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3484">핀란드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3484">Finland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-3485">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3485">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3486">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3486">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3487">숫자, 문자, 더하기 및 빼기 기호를 11 문자로 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3487">An 11-character combination of digits, letters, and plus and minus sign</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3488">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3488">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3489">숫자, 문자, 더하기 및 빼기 기호를 11 문자로 조합한 것입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3489">An 11-character combination of digits, letters, and plus and minus sign:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3490">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3490">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3491">더하기 기호, 빼기 기호 또는 + 기호가 1800-1899 사이에 태어난 것을 의미 하는 "A" (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 빼기 기호는 1900-1999 사이에 출생를 의미 하며 "A"는 "A"를 2000 의미 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3491">One of the following: a plus sign, a minus sign, or the letter "A" (not case sensitive) where the plus sign means born between 1800-1899, the minus sign means born between 1900-1999, and "A" means born 2000 and after</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3492">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3492">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3493">1 개의 문자 또는 한 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3493">One letter or one number</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3494">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3494">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3495">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3495">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3496">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3496">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3497">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3497">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3498">이 함수는 해당 `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3498">The function  `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3499">From 키워드를 `Keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3499">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-3500">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3500">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3501">이 함수는 해당 `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3501">The function  `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3552">프랑스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3552">France driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-3553">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형에 서 사용할 수 있으며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3553">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3554">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3554">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3555">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3555">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3556">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3556">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3557">비슷한 패턴(예: 프랑스 전화 번호)을 무시하기 위한 유효성 검사 기능을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3557">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3558">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3558">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3559">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3559">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3560">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3560">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3561">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3561">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3562">Func_french_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3562">The function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3563">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3563">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3564">Keyword_french_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3564">A keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3565">Func_eu_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3565">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3570">driving licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3570">driving licence</span></span>

## <a name="france-national-identification-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3577">프랑스 국가 식별 카드 (CNI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3577">France national identification card (CNI)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-3578">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3578">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3579">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3579">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3580">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3580">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3581">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3581">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3582">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3582">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3583">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3583">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3584">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3584">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3585">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3585">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3586">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3586">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3587">Regex_france_cni 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3587">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France CNI -->
<Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3589">card number</span></span>

## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3600">프랑스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3600">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-3601">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3601">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3602">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3602">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3603">9자리 숫자 및 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3603">Nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3604">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3604">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3605">9자리 숫자 및 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3605">Nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3606">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3606">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3607">2문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3607">Two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3608">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3608">Five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3609">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3609">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3610">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3610">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3611">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3611">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3612">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3612">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3613">Func_fr_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3613">The function Func_fr_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3614">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3614">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Passport Number -->
<Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3635">프랑스 사회 보장 번호 (INSEE) 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3635">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-3636">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 및 해당 ID와 관련 된 중요 한 정보 유형으로 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3636">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number and Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3637">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3637">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3638">15자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3638">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3639">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3639">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3640">다음 두 패턴 중 하나가 일치해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3640">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3641">13 자리 숫자와 공백 다음 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3641">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-3642">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3642">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3643">15자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3643">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3644">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3644">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3645">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3645">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3646">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3646">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3647">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3647">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3648">Func_french_insee 또는 Func_fr_insee 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3648">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3649">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3649">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3650">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3650">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3651">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3651">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3652">Func_french_insee 또는 Func_fr_insee 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3652">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3653">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3653">No keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3654">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3654">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France INSEE -->
<Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3670">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3670">social security number</span></span>

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3680">프랑스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3680">France tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-3681">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3681">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3682">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3682">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3683">개별 사용자의 경우 13 자리 숫자 및 엔터티의 경우 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3683">13 digits for individuals and nine digits for entities</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3684">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3684">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3685">개별 사용자에 대 한 13 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3685">13 digits for individuals:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3686">0, 1, 2 또는 3 이어야 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3686">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3687">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3687">12 digits</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-3688">엔터티의 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3688">Nine digits for entities</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3689">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3689">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3690">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3690">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3691">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3691">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3692">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3692">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3693">이 함수는 해당 `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3693">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3694">From 키워드를 `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3694">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-3695">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3695">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3696">이 함수는 해당 `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3696">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
 <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3716">독일 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3716">Germany driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-3717">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3717">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3718">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3718">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3719">11자리 숫자와 문자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3719">Combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3720">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3720">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3721">11자리 숫자와 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3721">11 digits and letters (not case sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3722">1자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3722">A digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3723">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3723">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3724">6자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3724">Six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3725">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3725">A digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3726">1자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3726">A digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3727">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3727">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3728">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3728">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3729">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3729">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3730">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3730">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3731">Func_german_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3731">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3732">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3732">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="18574-3733">Keyword_german_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3733">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="18574-3734">Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3734">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="18574-3735">Keyword_german_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3735">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3736">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3736">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3829">독일 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3829">Germany identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3830">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3830">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3831">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID에 해당 하는 중요 한 정보 유형으로 포함 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3831">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3832">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3832">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3833">2010 년 11 월 1 일 이후: 9 개 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3833">Since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3834">1 월 1987 년 10 월 31 일 (2010:10 자리 숫자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3834">From 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3835">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3835">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3836">2010년 11월 1일 이후:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3836">Since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3837">1개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3837">One letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3838">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3838">Eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3839">1 년 4 월 1987 일 ~ 10 2010 월 31 일까 지:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3839">From 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3840">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3840">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3841">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3841">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3842">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3842">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3843">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3843">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3844">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3844">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3845">정규식 Regex_germany_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3845">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3846">Keyword_germany_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3846">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3862">독일 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3862">Germany passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-3863">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3863">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3864">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3864">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3865">10자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3865">10 digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3866">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3866">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3867">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3867">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3868">첫 번째 문자는 숫자 또는 (C, F, G, H, J, K) 집합의 문자임</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3868">First character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3869">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3869">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3870">5자리 숫자 또는 (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z) 집합의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3870">Five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3871">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3871">A digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3872">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3872">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3873">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3873">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3874">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3874">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3875">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3875">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3876">Func_german_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3876">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3877">5개의 키워드 목록 중에 포함된 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3877">A keyword from any of the five keyword lists is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3878">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3878">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3879">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3879">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3880">Func_german_passport_data 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3880">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3881">5개의 키워드 목록 중에 포함된 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3881">A keyword from any of the five keyword lists is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3882">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3882">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Passport Number -->
<Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport2" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport2" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
