## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3900">독일 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3900">Germany tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-3901">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3901">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3902">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3902">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3903">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3903">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3904">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3904">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3905">11 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3905">11 digits :</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="18574-3906">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3906">Ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3907">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3907">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3908">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3908">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3909">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3909">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3910">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3910">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3911">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3911">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3912">이 함수는 해당 `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3912">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3913">From 키워드를 `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3913">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-3914">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3914">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3915">이 함수는 해당 `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3915">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3941">그리스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3941">Greece driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-3942">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3942">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3943">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3943">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3944">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3944">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3945">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3945">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="18574-3946">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3946">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3947">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3947">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3948">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3948">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3949">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3949">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3950">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3950">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3951">정규식이 해당 `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3951">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3952">From 키워드를 `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3952">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3958">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3958">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3962">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3962">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3963">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3963">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3964">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3964">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3965">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3965">driving license number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3968">Adeia odigisis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3968">Adeia odigisis</span></span>


## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3969">그리스 국가 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3969">Greece National ID Card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-3970">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3970">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3971">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3971">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3972">7-8자리 문자 및 숫자와 대시의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3972">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3973">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3973">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3974">7자리 문자 및 숫자(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3974">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3975">1개 문자(그리스어 알파벳의 임의 문자) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3975">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3976">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3976">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3977">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3977">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3978">8자리 문자와 숫자(새로운 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3978">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3979">그리스어 및 라틴어 알파벳 둘 다에 해당 대문자가 포함된 2개 문자(ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3979">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3980">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3980">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3981">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3981">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3982">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3982">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3983">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3983">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3984">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3984">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-3985">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3985">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3986">정규식 Regex_greece_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3986">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3987">Keyword_greece_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3987">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Greece National ID Card -->
<Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3988">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3988">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_greece_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3989">Keyword_greece_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3989">Keyword_greece_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3990">그리스 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3990">greek id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3991">그리스 국가 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3991">greek national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3992">그리스어 개인 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3992">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3993">그리스 경찰서 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3993">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-3994">id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3994">identity card</span></span>

## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-3998">그리스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3998">Greece passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-3999">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-3999">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4000">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4000">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4001">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 7 자리, 두 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4001">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4002">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4002">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4003">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4003">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4004">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4004">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4005">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4005">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4006">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4006">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4007">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4007">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4008">정규식이 해당 `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4008">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4009">From 키워드를 `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4009">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4010">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4010">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4011">**Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4011">**Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4012">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4012">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4013">그리스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4013">greek passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4014">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4014">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4015">διαβατηριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4015">διαβατηριο</span></span>

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4016">그리스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4016">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-4017">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4017">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4018">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4018">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4019">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4019">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4020">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4020">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4021">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4021">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4022">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4022">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4023">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4023">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4024">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4024">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4025">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4025">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4026">정규식이 해당 `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4026">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4027">From 키워드를 `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4027">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4056">HKID (홍콩 id 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4056">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4057">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4057">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4058">8-9자리 문자 및 숫자와 마지막 문자를 선택적 괄호로 묶어서 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4058">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4059">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4059">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4060">8-9자리 문자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4060">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4061">1-2개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4061">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4062">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4062">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4063">검사 숫자에 해당하고 선택적으로 괄호로 묶는 마지막 문자(임의 숫자 또는 문자 A)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4063">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4064">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4064">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4065">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4065">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4066">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4066">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4067">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4067">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4068">Func_hong_kong_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4068">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4069">Keyword_hong_kong_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4069">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4070">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4070">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4071">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4071">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4072">Func_hong_kong_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4072">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4073">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4073">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4090">香港身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4090">香港身分證</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4091">香港身分証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4091">香港身分証</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4113">헝가리어 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4113">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-4114">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4114">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4115">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4115">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4116">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4116">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4117">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4117">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4118">2 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4118">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4119">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4119">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4120">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4120">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4121">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4121">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4122">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4122">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4123">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4123">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4124">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4124">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4125">정규식이 해당 `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4125">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4126">From 키워드를 `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4126">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4127">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4127">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4128">**Keywords_hungary_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4128">**Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4129">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4129">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4130">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4130">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4131">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4131">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4132">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4132">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4133">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4133">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4134">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4134">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4135">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4135">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4136">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4136">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4137">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4137">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4138">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4138">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4139">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4139">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4140">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4140">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4141">vezetoi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4141">vezetoi engedely</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4142">헝가리어 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4142">Hungary national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-4143">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4143">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4144">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4144">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4145">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4145">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4146">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4146">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4147">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4147">11 digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="18574-4148">성별에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (1gb, 2 암, 기타 번호는 두 개를 포함 하는 경우 1900에만 발생 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4148">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4149">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4149">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4150">일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4150">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4151">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4151">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4152">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4152">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4153">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4153">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4154">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4154">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4155">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4155">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4156">이 함수는 해당 `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4156">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4157">From 키워드를 `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4157">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-4158">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4158">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4159">이 함수는 해당 `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4159">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
</Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4165">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4165">sz.</span></span><span data-ttu-id="18574-4166">ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4166"> ig.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4169">személyi igazolvány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4169">személyi igazolvány</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4170">헝가리어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4170">Hungary passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-4171">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4171">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4172">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4172">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4173">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 2 개 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4173">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4174">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4174">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4175">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 개 또는 7 개의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4175">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4176">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4176">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4177">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4177">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4178">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4178">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4179">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4179">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4180">정규식이 해당 `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4180">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4181">From 키워드를 `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4181">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4182">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4182">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4183">**Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4183">**Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4184">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4184">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4185">헝가리어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4185">hungarian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4186">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4186">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4187">útlevél száma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4187">útlevél száma</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4188">헝가리어 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4188">Hungary social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-4189">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4189">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4190">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4190">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4191">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4191">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4192">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4192">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4193">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4193">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4194">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4194">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4195">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4195">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4196">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4196">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4197">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4197">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4198">이 함수는 해당 `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4198">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4199">From 키워드를 `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4199">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-4200">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4200">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4201">이 함수는 해당 `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4201">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4221">헝가리어 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4221">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-4222">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4222">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4223">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4223">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4224">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4224">Ten digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4225">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4225">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4226">10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4226">Ten digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="18574-4227">"8" 이어야 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4227">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4228">날짜 01/01/1867과 개별 생년월일 사이의 일 수에 해당 하는 5 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4228">Five digits that correspond to the number of days between the date 01/01/1867 and the date of the birth of the individual</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4229">같은 날에 태어난 사람을 구별 하기 위해 기회가 만든 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4229">Three digits that correspond to the number generated by chance to differentiate individuals born on the same day</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4230">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4230">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4231">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4231">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4232">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4232">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4233">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4233">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4234">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4234">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4235">이 함수는 해당 `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4235">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4236">From 키워드를 `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4236">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-4237">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4237">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4238">이 함수는 해당 `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4238">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4249">세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4249">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4250">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4250">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4251">세금 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4251">tax no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4256">taxidnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4256">taxidnumber#</span></span>

## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4264">인도 (영구 계정 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4264">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4265">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4265">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4266">10자리 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4266">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4267">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4267">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4268">10자리 문자 또는 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4268">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4269">5개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4269">Five letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4270">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4270">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4271">알파벳 검사 숫자에 해당하는 문자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4271">A letter which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4272">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4272">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4273">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4273">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4274">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4274">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4275">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4275">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4276">정규식 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4276">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4277">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4277">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4278">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4278">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
<Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4279">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4279">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4280">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4280">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4281">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4281">Permanent Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4282">확대</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4282">PAN</span></span> 
   
## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4283">Aadhaar (인도 고유 식별) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4283">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4284">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4284">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4285">선택적 공백 또는 대시를 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4285">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4286">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4286">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4287">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4287">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4288">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4288">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4289">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4289">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4290">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4290">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4291">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4291">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4292">검사 숫자에 해당하는 마지막 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4292">The final digit which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4293">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4293">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4294">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4294">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4295">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4295">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4296">DLP 정책은 300 Func_india_aadhaar 문자에 근접 한 경우에는이 유형의 중요 한 정보를 검색 하는 것으로 85% 확신 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4296">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-4297">Keyword_india_aadhar에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4297">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-4298">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4298">The checksum passes.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-4299">DLP 정책은 300 Func_india_aadhaar 문자에 근접 한 경우에는이 유형의 중요 한 정보를 검색 하는 것으로 75% 확신 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4299">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-4300">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4300">The checksum passes.</span></span>
```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4301">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4301">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4302">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4302">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4303">Aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4303">Aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4304">Aadhaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4304">Aadhaar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4305">UID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4305">UID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4306">आधार</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4306">आधार</span></span>
   
## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4307">인도네시아 id 카드 (KTP) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4307">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4308">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4308">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4309">선택적으로 마침표를 포함하는 16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4309">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4310">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4310">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4311">16자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4311">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4312">2자리 시/도 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4312">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4313">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4313">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4314">2자리 지역 또는 구/군/시 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4314">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4315">2자리 소구역 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4315">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4316">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4316">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4317">생년월일에 해당하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4317">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4318">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4318">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4319">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4319">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4320">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4320">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4321">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4321">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4322">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4322">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4323">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4323">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4324">정규식 Regex_indonesia_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4324">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4325">Keyword_indonesia_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4325">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4326">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4326">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4327">정규식 Regex_indonesia_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4327">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4328">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4328">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4329">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4329">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4330">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4330">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4331">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4331">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4332">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4332">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4333">IBAN (국제 은행 계좌 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4333">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4334">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4334">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4335">국가 코드 (두 문자) + 검사 숫자 (2 자리 숫자)와 bban 숫자 (최대 30 자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4335">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4336">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4336">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4337">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4337">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4338">두 글자로 된 국가 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4338">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4339">두 개의 검사 숫자 (선택적 공백)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4339">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4340">1-7 개 문자 또는 숫자의 그룹 (공백으로 구분 가능)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4340">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4341">1-3 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4341">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4342">각 국가의 형식은 약간 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4342">The format for each country is slightly different.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="18574-4343">IBAN 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음과 같은 60 국가를 포함 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4343">The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4344">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, to, do, ee, es, fi,,, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, kw, il, vg,, nl-nl, tn,,,,,,,,, </c12>,,,,,,,,,,,,, rs, l, se, si,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4344">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4345">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4345">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4346">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4346">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4347">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4347">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4348">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4348">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4349">Func_iban 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4349">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4350">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4350">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4351">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4351">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4352">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4352">None</span></span>

   

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4353">Diseases의 국제 분류 (ICD-10-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4353">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4354">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4354">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4355">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4355">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4356">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4356">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4357">Keyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4357">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4358">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4358">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4359">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4359">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4360">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4360">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4361">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4361">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4362">Dictionary_icd_10_updated에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4362">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4363">Dictionary_icd_10_codes에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4363">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4364">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4364">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4365">업데이트 된 Dictionary_icd_10_ 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4365">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4366">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4366">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4367">[Diseases의 국제 분류, 10 번째 개정판, 임상 수정 (icd-10CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)을 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_10_updated 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4367">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="18574-4368">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어에 대해서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4368">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4369">[Diseases의 국제 분류, 10 번째 개정판, 임상 수정 (icd-10CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)을 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_10_codes 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4369">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="18574-4370">이 유형은 설명에 해당 하는 보험 코드 에서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4370">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4371">Diseases의 국제 분류 (ICD-9-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4371">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4372">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4372">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4373">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4373">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4374">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4374">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4375">Keyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4375">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4376">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4376">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4377">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4377">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4378">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4378">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4379">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4379">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4380">Dictionary_icd_9_updated에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4380">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4381">Dictionary_icd_9_codes에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4381">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4382">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4382">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4383">Dictionary_icd_9_updated에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4383">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4384">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4384">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4385">[Diseases, 아홉 번째 Revision, 임상 수정 (icd-9CM)의 국가별 분류](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)를 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4385">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="18574-4386">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어에 대해서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4386">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4387">[Diseases, 아홉 번째 Revision, 임상 수정 (icd-9CM)의 국가별 분류](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)를 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4387">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="18574-4388">이 유형은 설명에 해당 하는 보험 코드 에서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4388">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4389">IP 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4389">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4390">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4390">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4391">IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4391">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-4392">IPv4 주소의 서식 있는 버전(마침표 있음) 및 서식 없는 버전(마침표 없음)으로 구성된 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4392">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4393">IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4393">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-4394">서식 있는(콜론 포함) IPv6 번호로 구성된 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4394">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4395">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4395">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4396">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4396">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4397">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4397">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4398">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4398">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4399">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4399">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4400">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4400">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4401">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4401">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4402">IPv4의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4402">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4403">Regex_ipv4_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4403">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4404">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4404">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4405">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4405">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4406">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4406">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4407">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4407">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4408">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4408">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4409">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4409">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4410">IP(이 키워드는 대/소문자를 구분함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4410">IP (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4411">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4411">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4412">ip addresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4412">ip addresses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4413">internet protocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4413">internet protocol</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4414">IP-כתובת ה</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4414">IP-כתובת ה</span></span> 

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4415">아일랜드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4415">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-4416">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4416">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4417">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4417">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4418">6 자리 숫자와 4 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4418">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4419">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4419">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4420">6 자리 숫자와 4 개 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4420">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4421">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4421">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4422">4 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4422">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4423">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4423">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4424">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4424">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4425">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4425">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4426">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4426">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4427">정규식이 해당 `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4427">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4428">From 키워드를 `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4428">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4429">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4429">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4430">**Keywords_ireland_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4430">**Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4431">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4431">dl#</span></span>
