- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4433">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4433">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4434">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4434">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4435">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4435">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4436">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4436">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4437">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4437">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4438">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4438">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4439">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4439">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4440">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4440">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4441">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4441">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4442">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4442">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4443">ceadúnas tiomána</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4443">ceadúnas tiomána</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4444">아일랜드 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4444">Ireland national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-4445">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 형식에만 포함 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4445">This sensitive information type entity is only included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4446">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4446">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4447">지정 된 패턴에서 문자, 숫자 및 공백의 9 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4447">A nine-character combination of letters, digits, and a space in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4448">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4448">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4449">지정 된 패턴에서 문자, 숫자 및 공백의 9 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4449">A nine-character combination of letters, digits, and a space in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="18574-4450">01 년 1 월 2013 일 현재 위치:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4450">From 01 January 2013 to now:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="18574-4451">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4451">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4452">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4452">One check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4453">1 개의 공백 또는 대문자 "W" (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4453">One space or the uppercase letter "W" (Case sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-4454">01 년 1 월 2013 일 이전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4454">Prior to 01 January 2013:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4455">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4455">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4456">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4456">One check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4457">1 개의 공백 또는 대문자 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4457">One space or an uppercase letter (Case sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4458">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4458">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4459">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4459">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4460">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4460">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4461">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4461">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4462">이 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4462">The function finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4463">From 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4463">A keyword from is found.</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-4464">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4464">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4465">이 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4465">The function finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
    
```xml
 <!--Ireland national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4494">아일랜드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4494">Ireland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-4495">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4495">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4496">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4496">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4497">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4497">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4498">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4498">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4499">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4499">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4500">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4500">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4501">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4501">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4502">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4502">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4503">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4503">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4504">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4504">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4505">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4505">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4506">정규식이 해당 `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4506">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4507">From 키워드를 `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4507">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4508">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4508">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4509">**Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4509">**Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4510">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4510">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4511">아일랜드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4511">irish passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4512">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4512">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4513">pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4513">pas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4514">여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4514">passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4515">포트</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4515">passeport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4516">포트 numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4516">passeport numero</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4517">아일랜드 PPS (개인 공개 서비스) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4517">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4518">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4518">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4519">이전 형식 (31 년 12 월 2012 일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4519">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4520">7자리 숫자와 1-2개 문자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4520">Seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4521">새 형식 (1 년 1 월 2013 및 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4521">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4522">7자리 숫자와 2개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4522">Seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4523">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4523">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4524">이전 형식 (31 년 12 월 2012 일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4524">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4525">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4525">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4526">1-2개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4526">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4527">새 형식 (1 년 1 월 2013 및 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4527">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4528">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4528">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4529">알파벳 검사 숫자에 해당하는 문자 1개(대/소문자 구분 안 함) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4529">A letter (not case sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4530">문자 "A" 또는 "H"(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4530">The letter "A" or "H" (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4531">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4531">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4532">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4532">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4533">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4533">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4534">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4534">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4535">Func_ireland_pps 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4535">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4536">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4536">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="18574-4537">Keyword_ireland_pps에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4537">A keyword from Keyword_ireland_pps is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="18574-4538">Func_eu_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4538">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4539">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4539">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4540">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4540">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4541">Func_ireland_pps 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4541">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4542">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4542">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
<Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps"/>
     <Any minMatches="1">
  <Match idRef="Keyword_ireland_pps"/>
  <Match idRef="Func_eu_date"/>
     </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4543">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4543">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ireland_pps"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4544">Keyword_ireland_pps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4544">Keyword_ireland_pps</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4545">Personal Public Service Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4545">Personal Public Service Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4546">PPS Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4546">PPS Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4547">PPS Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4547">PPS Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4548">PPS No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4548">PPS No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4549">PPS #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4549">PPS #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4550">.PPS #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4550">PPS#</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4551">PPSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4551">PPSN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4552">Public Services Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4552">Public Services Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4553">Uimhir Phearsanta Seirbhíse Poiblí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4553">Uimhir Phearsanta Seirbhíse Poiblí</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4554">Uimh</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4554">Uimh.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="18574-4555">PSP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4555">PSP</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4556">PSP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4556">PSP</span></span> 


## <a name="ireland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4557">아일랜드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4557">Ireland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-4558">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4558">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4559">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4559">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4560">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 7 자리 숫자와 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4560">Seven digits followed by a letter with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4561">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4561">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4562">7 자리 숫자와 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4562">Seven digits followed by a letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4563">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4563">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4564">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4564">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4565">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4565">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4566">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4566">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4567">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4567">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4568">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4568">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4569">이 함수는 해당 `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4569">The function  `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4570">From 키워드를 `Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4570">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-4571">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4571">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4572">이 함수는 해당 `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4572">The function  `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4601">이스라엘 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4601">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4602">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4602">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4603">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4603">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4604">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4604">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4605">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4605">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4606">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4606">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4607">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4607">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4608">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4608">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4609">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4609">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4610">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4610">Eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4611">서식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4611">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4612">13자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4612">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4613">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4613">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4614">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4614">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4615">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4615">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4616">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4616">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4617">Regex_israel_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4617">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4618">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4618">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4619">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4619">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4620">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4620">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4621">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4621">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4622">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4622">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4623">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4623">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4624">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4624">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4625">이스라엘 국내 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4625">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4626">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4626">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4627">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4627">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4628">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4628">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4629">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4629">Nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4630">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4630">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4631">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4631">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4632">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4632">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4633">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4633">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4634">Func_israeli_national_id_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4634">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4635">Keyword_Israel_National_ID의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4635">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4636">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4636">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4637">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4637">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4638">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4638">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4639">מספר זהות</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4639">מספר זהות</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4640">National ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4640">National ID Number</span></span>
   
## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4641">이탈리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4641">Italy driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-4642">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4642">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4643">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4643">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4644">10개의 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4644">A combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4645">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4645">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4646">10개의 문자 및 숫자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4646">A combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4647">1개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4647">One letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4648">문자 "A" 또는 "V"(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4648">The letter "A" or "V" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4649">7개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함), 숫자 또는 밑줄 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4649">Seven letters (not case sensitive), digits, or the underscore character</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4650">1개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4650">One letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4651">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4651">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4652">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4652">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4653">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4653">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4654">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4654">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4655">Regex_italy_drivers_license_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4655">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4656">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4656">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4657">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4657">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4658">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4658">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4659">numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4659">numero di patente di guida</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4660">patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4660">patente di guida</span></span> 

## <a name="italy-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4661">이탈리아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4661">Italy national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-4662">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4662">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4663">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4663">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4664">지정 된 패턴에 해당 하는 문자 및 숫자의 16 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4664">A 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4665">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4665">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4666">문자와 숫자의 16 자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4666">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4667">가족 이름에서 처음 세 개의 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4667">Three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4668">이름의 첫 번째, 세 번째 및 네 번째 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4668">Three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4669">출생 연도의 마지막 자리에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4669">Two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4670">출생 월의 문자에 해당 하는 한 문자는 알파벳 순서로 사용 되지만 1 ~ E, H, L, M, P, R에 해당 하는 문자를 사용 하는 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4670">One letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4671">Genders를 구분 하기 위해 출생 달의 날짜에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자 (40)가 여성 생년월일에 추가 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4671">Two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4672">사용자가 태어난 municipality 관련 지역 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자 (국가 전체 코드는 외국 국가에 사용 됨)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4672">Four digits that corresponds to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4673">1 개의 패리티 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4673">One parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4674">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4674">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4675">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4675">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4676">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4676">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4677">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4677">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4678">이 함수는 해당 `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4678">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4679">From 키워드를 `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4679">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-4680">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4680">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4681">이 함수는 해당 `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4681">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Italy national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4716">이탈리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4716">Italy passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-4717">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4717">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4718">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4718">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4719">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4719">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4720">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4720">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4721">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4721">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4722">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4722">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4723">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4723">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4724">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4724">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4725">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4725">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4726">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4726">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4727">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4727">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4728">정규식이 해당 `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4728">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4729">From 키워드를 `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4729">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4730">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4730">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4731">**Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4731">**Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4732">이탈리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4732">italian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4733">repubblica italiana passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4733">repubblica italiana passaporto</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4734">passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4734">passaporto</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4735">passaporto italiana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4735">passaporto italiana</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4736">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4736">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4737">italiana passaporto numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4737">italiana passaporto numero</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4738">passaporto numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4738">passaporto numero</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4739">numéro) 포트 italien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4739">numéro passeport italien</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4740">numéro (고) 포트</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4740">numéro passeport</span></span>

## <a name="italy-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4741">이탈리아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4741">Italy tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-4742">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4742">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4743">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4743">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4744">지정 된 패턴의 문자와 숫자 16 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4744">16 letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4745">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4745">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4746">16 자의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4746">16 letters and digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="18574-4747">가족 이름에서 처음 세 개의 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4747">Three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4748">이름의 첫 번째, 세 번째 및 네 번째 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4748">Three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4749">출생 연도의 마지막 자리에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4749">Two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4750">출생 달에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자는 알파벳 순으로 사용 되지만 A에서 E, H, L, M, P, R에 해당 하는 문자만 사용 되며, 따라서 1 월은 A와 10 월이 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4750">One digit that corresponds to the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4751">남성의와 구별 하기 위해 여성의 경우 짝수에서 출생 일에 40이 추가 되는 출생 달의 날짜에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4751">Two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth where 40 is added to the day of birth for females to differentiate from males</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4752">사용자가 태어난 municipality 관련 지역 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자-국가 전체 코드를 외국 국가에 사용 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4752">Four digits that correspond to an area code specific to the municipality where the person was born—country-wide codes are used for foreign countries</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4753">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4753">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4754">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4754">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4755">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4755">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4756">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4756">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4757">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4757">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4758">이 함수는 해당 `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4758">The function  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4759">From 키워드를 `Keywords_italy_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4759">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-4760">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4760">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4761">이 함수는 해당 `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4761">The function  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4796">일본 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4796">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4797">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4797">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4798">7 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4798">Seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4799">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4799">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4800">은행 계좌 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4800">Bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4801">7 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4801">Seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4802">은행 계좌 지점 코드:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4802">Bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4803">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4803">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4804">공백 또는 대시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4804">A space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4805">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4805">Three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4806">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4806">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4807">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4807">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4808">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4808">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4809">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4809">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4810">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4810">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4811">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4811">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4812">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4812">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4813">Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4813">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4814">Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4814">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4815">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4815">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4816">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4816">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4817">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4817">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4876">일본 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4876">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4877">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4877">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4878">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4878">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4879">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4879">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4880">12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4880">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4881">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4881">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4882">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4882">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4883">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4883">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4884">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4884">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4885">Func_jp_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4885">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4886">Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4886">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4914">일본 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4914">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4915">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4915">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4916">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4916">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4917">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4917">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4918">2개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4918">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4919">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4919">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4920">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4920">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4921">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4921">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4922">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4922">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4923">Func_jp_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4923">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4924">Keyword_jp_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4924">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4925">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4925">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4931">일본 거주지 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4931">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4932">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4932">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4933">12 개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4933">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4934">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4934">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4935">12 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4935">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4936">2문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4936">Two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4937">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4937">Eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4938">2문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4938">Two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4939">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4939">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4940">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4940">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4941">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4941">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4942">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4942">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4943">정규식 Regex_jp_residence_card_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4943">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4944">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4944">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4945">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4945">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4946">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4946">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4947">거주지 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4947">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4948">거주지 카드 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4948">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4949">거주지 카드 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4949">Residence card #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4950">在留カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4950">在留カード番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4951">일본 상주 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4951">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4952">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4952">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4953">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4953">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4954">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4954">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4955">11자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4955">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4956">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4956">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4957">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4957">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4958">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4958">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4959">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4959">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4960">Func_jp_resident_registration_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4960">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4961">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4961">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4975">일본 SIN (사회 보험 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4975">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4976">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4976">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4977">7-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4977">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4978">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4978">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4979">7-12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4979">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4980">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4980">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4981">하이픈 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4981">A hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4982">6 자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4982">Six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4983">7-12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4983">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4984">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4984">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4985">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4985">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-4986">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4986">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4987">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4987">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4988">Func_jp_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4988">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4989">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4989">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-4990">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4990">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4991">Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4991">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4992">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4992">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4996">Social Insurance Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4996">Social Insurance Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4997">Social Insurance Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4997">Social Insurance Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4998">社会保険のテンキー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4998">社会保険のテンキー</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-4999">社会保険番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-4999">社会保険番号</span></span> 

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5000">라트비아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5000">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-5001">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5001">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5002">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5002">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5003">3 개의 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5003">Three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5004">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5004">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5005">3 개의 문자 및 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5005">Three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="18574-5006">3 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5006">Three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5007">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5007">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5008">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5008">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5009">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5009">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5010">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5010">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5011">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5011">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5012">정규식이 해당 `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5012">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5013">From 키워드를 `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5013">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5015">**Keywords_latvia_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5015">**Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5019">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5019">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5020">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5020">drivers lic.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5023">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5023">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5024">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5024">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5025">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5025">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5026">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5026">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5027">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5027">dlno#</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5029">라트비아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5029">Latvia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-5030">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5030">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5031">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5031">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5032">지정 된 형식의 11 자리 숫자 및 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5032">11 digits and a hyphen in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5033">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5033">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5034">11 자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5034">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="18574-5035">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5035">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5036">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5036">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5037">출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (19th 세기의 경우 "1", 21 세기의 경우 "2")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5037">One digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5038">임의로 생성 되는 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5038">Four digits, randomly generated</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5039">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5039">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5040">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5040">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5041">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5041">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5042">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5042">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5043">이 함수는 해당 `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5043">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5044">From 키워드를 `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5044">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-5045">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5045">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5046">이 함수는 해당 `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5046">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Latvia national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
 <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5047">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5047">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5048">Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5048">Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5049">관리 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5049">administrative number</span></span>
