## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5109">라트비아, 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5109">Latvia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-5110">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5110">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5111">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5111">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5112">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5112">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5113">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5113">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5114">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5114">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5115">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5115">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5116">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5116">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5117">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5117">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5118">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5118">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5119">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5119">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5120">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5120">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5121">정규식이 해당 `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5121">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5122">From 키워드를 `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5122">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5123">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5123">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5124">**Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5124">**Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5125">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5125">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5126">라트비아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5126">latvian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5127">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5127">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5128">pase numurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5128">pase numurs</span></span>    

## <a name="latvia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5129">라트비아 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5129">Latvia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-5130">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5130">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5131">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5131">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5132">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5132">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5133">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5133">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5134">지정 된 패턴에서 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5134">11 digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5135">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5135">Six digits that correspond to the date of birth (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5136">출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 이며, "0"은 19th 세기에 해당 하 고 "1"은 20th 세기에 해당 하며 21 세기에 해당 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5136">One digit that corresponds to the century of birth where "0" corresponds to 19th century, "1" corresponds to 20th century, and "2"corresponds to 21st century</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5137">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5137">Four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5138">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5138">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5139">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5139">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5140">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5140">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5141">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5141">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5142">이 함수는 해당 `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5142">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5143">From 키워드를 `Keywords_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5143">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-5144">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5144">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5145">이 함수는 해당 `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5145">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5152">민사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5152">civil number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5155">회계 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5155">fiscal code</span></span>

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5208">리투아니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5208">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-5209">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5209">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5210">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5210">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5211">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5211">Eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5212">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5212">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="18574-5213">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5213">Eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5214">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5214">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5215">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5215">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5216">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5216">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5217">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5217">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5218">정규식이 해당 `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5218">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5219">From 키워드를 `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5219">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5221">**Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5221">**Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5224">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5224">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5225">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5225">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5231">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5231">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5232">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5232">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="lithuania-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5235">리투아니아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5235">Lithuania national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-5236">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5236">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5237">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5237">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5238">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5238">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5239">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5239">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5240">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5240">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5241">사용자의 성별 및 출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5241">One digit that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5242">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5242">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5243">출생 날짜의 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5243">Three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5244">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5244">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5245">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5245">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5246">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5246">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5247">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5247">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5248">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5248">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5249">이 함수는 해당 `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5249">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5250">From 키워드를 `Keywords_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5250">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-5251">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5251">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5252">이 함수는 해당 `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5252">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Lithuania national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern> 
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5260">mokesčių identifikavimo numeris</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5260">mokesčių identifikavimo numeris</span></span>

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5287">리투아니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5287">Lithuania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-5288">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5288">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5289">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5289">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5290">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5290">Eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5291">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5291">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5292">8 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5292">Eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5293">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5293">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5294">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5294">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5295">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5295">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5296">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5296">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5297">정규식이 해당 `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5297">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5298">From 키워드를 `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5298">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5299">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5299">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5300">**Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5300">**Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5301">여권 번호 lithunian 여권 번호 passport 암호 없음 o numeris</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5301">passport number lithunian passport number passport no paso numeris</span></span>

## <a name="lithuania-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5302">리투아니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5302">Lithuania tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-5303">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5303">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5304">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5304">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5305">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5305">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5306">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5306">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5307">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5307">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5308">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5308">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5309">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5309">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5310">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5310">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5311">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5311">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5312">이 함수는 해당 `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5312">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5313">From 키워드를 `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5313">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-5314">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5314">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5315">이 함수는 해당 `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5315">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5349">룩셈부르크 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5349">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-5350">중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5350">his sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5351">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5351">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5352">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5352">Six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5353">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5353">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="18574-5354">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5354">Six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5355">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5355">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5356">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5356">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5357">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5357">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5358">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5358">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5359">정규식이 해당 `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5359">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5360">From 키워드를 `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5360">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5376">룩셈부르크 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5376">Luxemburg national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-5377">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5377">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5378">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5378">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5379">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5379">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5380">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5380">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5381">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5381">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5382">사용자의 성별 및 출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5382">One digit that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5383">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5383">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5384">출생 날짜의 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5384">Three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5385">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5385">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5386">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5386">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5387">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5387">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5388">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5388">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5389">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5389">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5390">정규식이 해당 `Regex_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5390">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5391">From 키워드를 `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5391">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5414">룩셈부르크 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5414">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-5415">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5415">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5416">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5416">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5417">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5417">Eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5418">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5418">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5419">8 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5419">Eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5420">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5420">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5421">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5421">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5422">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5422">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5423">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5423">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5424">정규식이 해당 `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5424">The regular expression  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5425">From 키워드를 `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5425">A keyword from  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_nation_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5426">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5426">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5427">**Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5427">**Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5428">여권 번호 라트비아어 여권 passport 번호 passport passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5428">passport number latvian passport number passport no passnummer</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5429">룩셈부르크 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5429">Luxemburg tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-5430">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5430">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5431">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5431">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5432">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5432">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5433">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5433">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5434">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5434">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5435">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5435">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5436">2개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5436">Two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5437">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5437">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5438">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5438">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5439">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5439">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5440">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5440">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5441">이 함수는 해당 `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5441">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5442">From 키워드를 `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5442">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-5443">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5443">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5444">이 함수는 해당 `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5444">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5484">말레이시아 식별 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5484">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5485">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5485">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5486">선택적으로 하이픈을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5486">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5487">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5487">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5488">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5488">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5489">생년월일에 해당하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5489">Six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5490">대시(옵션)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5490">A dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5491">2개 문자로 이루어진 출생지 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5491">Two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5492">대시(옵션)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5492">A dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5493">임의의 3자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5493">Three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5494">1자리 성별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5494">One-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5495">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5495">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5496">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5496">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5497">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5497">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5498">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5498">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5499">정규식 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5499">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5500">Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5500">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5527">몰타 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5527">Malta driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-5528">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5528">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5529">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5529">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5530">지정 된 패턴에서 두 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5530">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5531">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5531">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5532">두 문자와 6 자리 숫자의 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5532">Combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5533">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5533">Two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5534">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5534">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5535">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5535">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5536">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5536">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5537">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5537">Three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5538">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5538">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5539">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5539">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5540">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5540">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5541">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5541">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5542">정규식이 해당 `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5542">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5543">From 키워드를 `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5543">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
 <Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5544">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5544">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5545">**Keywords_malta_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5545">**Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5546">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5546">dl#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5548">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5548">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5549">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5549">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5550">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5550">drivers lic.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5553">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5553">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5554">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5554">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5555">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5555">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5556">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5556">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5557">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5557">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5558">liċenzja tas-sewqan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5558">liċenzja tas-sewqan</span></span>

## <a name="malta-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5559">몰타 국내 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5559">Malta national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-5560">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5560">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5561">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5561">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5562">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5562">Seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5563">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5563">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5564">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5564">Seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="18574-5565">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5565">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5566">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5566">One uppercase letter (case sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5567">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5567">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5568">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5568">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5569">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5569">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5570">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5570">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5571">정규식이 해당 `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5571">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5572">From 키워드를 `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5572">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-5573">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5573">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5574">정규식이 해당 `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5574">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!--Malta national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5591">몰타 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5591">Malta passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-5592">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5592">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5593">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5593">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5594">공백이 나 구분 기호 없이 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5594">Seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5595">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5595">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="18574-5596">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5596">Seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5597">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5597">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5598">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5598">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5599">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5599">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5600">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5600">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5601">정규식이 해당 `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5601">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5602">From 키워드를 `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5602">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5603">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5603">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5604">**Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5604">**Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5605">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5605">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5606">몰타어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5606">maltese passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5607">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5607">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5608">numru-passaport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5608">numru tal-passaport</span></span>

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5609">몰타 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5609">Malta tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-5610">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5610">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5611">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5611">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5612">몰타어 nationals의 경우 지정 된 패턴의 7 자리 및 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5612">For Maltese nationals: 7 digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="18574-5613">몰타어 이외의 nationals 및 몰타어 엔터티: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5613">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: 9 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5614">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5614">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5615">몰타어 nationals: 7 자리 숫자 및 1 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5615">Maltese nationals: 7 digits and one letter</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="18574-5616">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5616">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5617">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5617">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-5618">몰타어 이외의 nationals 및 몰타어 엔터티: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5618">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: 9 digits</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="18574-5619">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5619">Nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5620">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5620">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5621">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5621">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5622">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5622">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5623">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5623">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5624">이 함수는 해당 `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5624">The function  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5625">From 키워드를 `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5625">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-5626">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5626">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5627">이 함수는 해당 `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5627">The function  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5660">네덜란드 시민 서비스 (BSN) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5660">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5661">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5661">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5662">선택적으로 공백을 포함하는 8-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5662">8-9 digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5663">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5663">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5664">8-9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5664">8-9 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5665">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5665">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5666">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5666">A space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5667">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5667">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5668">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5668">A space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5669">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5669">2-3 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5670">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5670">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5671">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5671">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5672">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5672">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5673">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5673">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5674">Func_netherlands_bsn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5674">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5675">Keyword_netherlands_bsn에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5675">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5676">Func_eu_date2 함수는 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5676">The function Func_eu_date2 finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5677">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5677">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
<Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" /> 
       <Match idRef="Keyword_netherlands_bsn" /> 
       <Match idRef="Func_eu_date2" /> 
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5701">네덜란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5701">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-5702">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5702">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5703">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5703">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5704">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5704">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5705">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5705">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5706">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5706">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5707">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5707">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5708">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5708">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5709">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5709">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5710">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5710">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5711">정규식이 해당 `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5711">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5712">From 키워드를 `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5712">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5725">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5725">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5730">네덜란드 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5730">Netherlands national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-5731">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5731">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5732">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5732">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5733">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5733">Nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5734">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5734">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5735">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5735">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5736">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5736">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5737">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5737">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5738">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5738">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5739">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5739">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5740">이 함수는 해당 `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5740">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5741">From 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5741">A keyword from is found.</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-5742">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5742">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5743">이 함수는 해당 `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5743">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!--Netherland national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5767">네덜란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5767">Netherlands passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-5768">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5768">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5769">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5769">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5770">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5770">Nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5771">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5771">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5772">9 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5772">Nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5773">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5773">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5774">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5774">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5775">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5775">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5776">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5776">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5777">정규식이 해당 `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5777">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5778">From 키워드를 `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5778">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5779">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5779">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5780">**Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5780">**Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5781">네덜란드어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5781">dutch passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5782">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5782">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5783">네덜란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5783">netherlands passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5784">nederlanden, nummer ort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5784">nederlanden paspoort nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5785">고 대/ort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5785">paspoort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5786">nederlanden paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5786">nederlanden paspoortnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5787">paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5787">paspoortnummer</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5788">네덜란드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5788">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-5789">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5789">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5790">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5790">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5791">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5791">Nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5792">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5792">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5793">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5793">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5794">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5794">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5795">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5795">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5796">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5796">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5797">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5797">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5798">이 함수는 해당 `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5798">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5799">From 키워드를 `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5799">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-5800">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5800">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5801">이 함수는 해당 `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5801">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5839">뉴질랜드 보건부 (생명 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5839">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5840">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5840">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5841">3개 문자, 공백 1개(선택 사항) 및 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5841">Three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5842">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5842">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5843">3 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 공백 (선택 사항) 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5843">Three letters (not case sensitive) a space (optional) four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5844">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5844">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5845">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5845">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5846">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5846">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5847">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5847">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5848">Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5848">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5849">Keyword_nz_terms의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5849">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5850">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5850">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
<Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5851">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5851">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5852">Keyword_nz_terms</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5852">Keyword_nz_terms</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5853">NHI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5853">NHI</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5854">New Zealand</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5854">New Zealand</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5855">상태</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5855">Health</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5856">처리가</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5856">treatment</span></span> 
   
## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5857">노르웨이 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5857">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5858">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5858">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5859">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5859">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5860">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5860">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5861">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5861">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5862">생년월일에 해당하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5862">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5863">3자리 개인 번호 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5863">Three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5864">2개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5864">Two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5865">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5865">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5866">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5866">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5867">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5867">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5868">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5868">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5869">Func_norway_id_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5869">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5870">Keyword_norway_id_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5870">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5871">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5871">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5872">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5872">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5873">Func_norway_id_numbe 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5873">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5874">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5874">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
