## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5883">필리핀 통합 다목적 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5883">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5884">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5884">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5885">하이픈으로 구분된 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5885">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5886">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5886">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5887">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5887">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5888">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5888">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5889">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5889">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5890">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5890">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5891">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5891">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5892">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5892">One digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5893">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5893">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5894">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5894">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5895">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5895">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5896">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5896">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5897">정규식 Regex_philippines_unified_id 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5897">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5898">Keyword_philippines_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5898">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5899">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5899">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5900">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5900">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5901">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5901">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5902">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5902">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5903">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5903">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5904">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5904">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5905">폴란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5905">Poland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-5906">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5906">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5907">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5907">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5908">두 개의 슬래시를 포함 하는 14 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5908">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5909">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5909">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5910">14 자리 숫자와 2 개의 슬래시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5910">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="18574-5911">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5911">Five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5912">정방향 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5912">A forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5913">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5913">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5914">정방향 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5914">A forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5915">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5915">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5916">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5916">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5917">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5917">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5918">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5918">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5919">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5919">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5920">정규식이 해당 `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5920">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5921">From 키워드를 `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5921">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5922">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5922">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5923">**Keywords_poland_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5923">**Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5924">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5924">dl#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5926">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5926">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5927">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5927">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5928">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5928">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5929">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5929">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5930">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5930">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5931">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5931">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5932">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5932">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5933">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5933">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5934">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5934">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5935">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5935">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5936">prawo jazdy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5936">prawo jazdy</span></span>

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5937">폴란드 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5937">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5938">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5938">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5939">3개의 문자 및 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5939">Three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5940">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5940">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5941">3개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5941">Three letters (not case sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5942">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5942">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5943">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5943">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5944">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5944">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5945">DLP 정책은 300 Func_polish_national_id 문자에 근접 한 경우에는이 유형의 중요 한 정보를 검색 하는 것으로 75% 확신 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5945">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-5946">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5946">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-5947">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5947">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5948">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5948">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5949">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5949">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5950">Dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5950">Dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5951">U r i dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5951">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5952">Nazwa i u r i dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5952">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5953">Nazwa i veiligheid dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5953">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5954">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5954">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5955">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5955">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5956">dow.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5956">dow.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="18574-5957">르.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5957">os.</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5958">폴란드 국가 ID(PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5958">Poland National ID (PESEL)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-5959">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5959">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5960">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5960">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5961">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5961">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5962">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5962">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5963">11자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5963">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5964">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5964">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5965">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5965">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5966">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5966">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5967">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5967">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5968">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5968">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5969">Keyword_pesel_identification_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5969">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5970">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5970">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->      
<Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5982">폴란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5982">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-5983">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5983">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5984">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5984">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5985">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5985">Two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5986">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5986">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5987">2개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5987">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5988">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5988">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5989">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5989">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5990">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5990">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-5991">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5991">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5992">Func_polish_passport_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5992">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5993">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5993">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5994">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5994">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5995">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5995">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-5996">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5996">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5997">U r i (zportu)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5997">Numer paszportu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-5998">Veiligheid.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5998">Nr.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="18574-5999">고 zportu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-5999">Paszportu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6000">고 zport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6000">Paszport</span></span>

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6001">폴란드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6001">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-6002">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6002">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6003">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6003">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6004">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6004">Eleven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6005">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6005">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6006">11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6006">Eleven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6007">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6007">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6008">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6008">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6009">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6009">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6010">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6010">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6011">이 함수는 해당 `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6011">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6012">From 키워드를 `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6012">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-6013">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6013">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6014">이 함수는 해당 `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6014">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6044">포르투갈 시민 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6044">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6045">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6045">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6046">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID에 해당 하는 중요 한 정보 유형으로 포함 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6046">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6047">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6047">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6048">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6048">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6049">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6049">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6050">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6050">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6051">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6051">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6052">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6052">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6053">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6053">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6054">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6054">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6055">정규식 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6055">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6056">Keyword_portugal_citizen_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6056">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6057">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6057">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_portugal_citizen_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6058">Keyword_portugal_citizen_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6058">Keyword_portugal_citizen_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6059">bilhete de identidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6059">bilhete de identidade</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6060">cartão de cidadão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6060">cartão de cidadão</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6061">시민 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6061">citizen card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6062">문서 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6062">document number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6063">documento de identificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6063">documento de identificação</span></span>

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6066">identification number</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6076">포르투갈 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6076">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-6077">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6077">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6078">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6078">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6079">두 개의 문자와 지정 된 패턴에 있는 일곱 개의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6079">Two letters followed by a seven numbers in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6080">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6080">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6081">두 문자 다음에 특수 문자를 사용한 7 개의 숫자를 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6081">Two letters followed by seven numbers with special characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6082">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6082">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6083">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6083">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6084">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6084">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6085">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6085">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6086">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6086">One digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6087">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6087">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6088">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6088">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6089">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6089">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6090">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6090">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6091">정규식이 해당 `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6091">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6092">From 키워드를 `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6092">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6093">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6093">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6094">**Keywords_portugal_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6094">**Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6095">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6095">dl#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6097">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6097">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6098">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6098">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6099">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6099">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6100">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6100">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6101">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6101">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6102">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6102">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6103">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6103">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6104">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6104">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6105">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6105">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6108">포르투갈 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6108">Portugal passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-6109">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6109">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6110">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6110">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6111">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 한 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6111">One letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6112">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6112">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6113">1 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6113">One letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6114">1개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6114">One letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6115">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6115">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6116">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6116">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6117">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6117">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6118">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6118">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6119">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6119">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6120">정규식이 해당 `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6120">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6121">From 키워드를 `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6121">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6122">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6122">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6123">**Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6123">**Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6124">여권 번호 포르투갈어 passport 번호 passport número do passaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6124">passport number portuguese passport number passport no número do passaporte</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6125">포르투갈 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6125">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-6126">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6126">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6127">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6127">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6128">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6128">Nine digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6129">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6129">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6130">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6130">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6131">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6131">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6132">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6132">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6133">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6133">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6134">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6134">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6135">이 함수는 해당 `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6135">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6136">From 키워드를 `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6136">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-6137">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6137">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6138">이 함수는 해당 `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6138">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6163">루마니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6163">Romania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-6164">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6164">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6165">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6165">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6166">한 문자 다음에 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6166">One character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6167">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6167">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6168">1 개의 문자 다음에 8 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6168">One character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6169">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6169">One letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6170">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6170">Eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6171">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6171">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6172">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6172">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6173">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6173">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6174">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6174">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6175">정규식이 해당 `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6175">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6176">From 키워드를 `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6176">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6178">**Keywords_romania_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6178">**Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6181">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6181">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6182">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6182">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6187">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6187">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6188">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6188">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6189">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6189">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="romania-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6192">루마니아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6192">Romania national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-6193">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6193">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6194">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6194">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6195">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6195">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6196">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6196">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6197">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6197">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6198">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6198">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6199">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6199">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6200">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6200">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6201">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6201">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6202">이 함수는 해당 `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6202">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6203">From 키워드를 `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6203">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-6204">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6204">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6205">이 함수는 해당 `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6205">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!--Romania national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6256">루마니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6256">Romania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-6257">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6257">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6258">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6258">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6259">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 8 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6259">Eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6260">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6260">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6261">8 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6261">Eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6262">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6262">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6263">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6263">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6264">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6264">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6265">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6265">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6266">정규식이 해당 `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6266">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6267">From 키워드를 `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6267">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6274">루마니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6274">Romania tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-6275">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6275">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6276">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6276">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6277">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6277">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6278">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6278">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6279">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6279">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6280">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6280">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6281">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6281">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6282">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6282">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6283">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6283">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6284">정규식이 해당 `Regex_romania_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6284">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6285">From 키워드를 `Keywords_romania_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6285">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6336">사우디 아라비아 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6336">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6337">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6337">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6338">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6338">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6339">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6339">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6340">10자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6340">10 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6341">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6341">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6342">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6342">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6343">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6343">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6344">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6344">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6345">Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6345">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6346">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6346">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6347">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6347">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6348">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6348">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6349">Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6349">Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6350">I card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6350">I card number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6351">ID number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6351">ID number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6352">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6352">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span> 

   
## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6353">싱가포르 NRIC (국가 등록 id 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6353">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6354">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6354">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6355">9개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6355">Nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6356">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6356">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6357">9개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6357">Nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6358">문자 "F", "G", "S" 또는 "T"(대/소문자 구분 안 함) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6358">The letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6359">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6359">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6360">알파벳 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6360">An alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6361">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6361">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6362">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6362">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6363">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6363">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6364">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6364">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6365">정규식 Regex_singapore_nric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6365">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6366">Keyword_singapore_nric에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6366">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6367">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6367">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6368">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6368">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6369">정규식 Regex_singapore_nric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6369">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6370">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6370">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6371">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6371">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_singapore_nric"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6372">Keyword_singapore_nric</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6372">Keyword_singapore_nric</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6373">National Registration Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6373">National Registration Identity Card</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6381">슬로바키아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6381">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-6382">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6382">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6383">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6383">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6384">한 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6384">One character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6385">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6385">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6386">한 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6386">One character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6387">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6387">One letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
-  <span data-ttu-id="18574-6388">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6388">Seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6389">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6389">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6390">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6390">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6391">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6391">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6392">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6392">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6393">정규식이 해당 `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6393">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6394">From 키워드를 `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6394">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovaknia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6396">**Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6396">**Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6397">dl # driver license driver 면허 번호 드라이버 라이선스 드라이버 lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6397">dl# driver license driver license number driver licence drivers lic.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-6398">drivers license driver 면허 드라이버의 라이선스 드라이버 라이선스 번호 운전 면허 번호 라이센스 번호 제어 # vodičský preukaz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6398">drivers license drivers licence driver's license driver's license number driver's licence number driving license number dlno# vodičský preukaz</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6399">슬로바키아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6399">Slovakia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-6400">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6400">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6401">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6401">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6402">백슬래시 하나를 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6402">Ten digits containing one backslash</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6404">백슬래시 하나를 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6404">Ten digits containing one backslash:</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6405">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6405">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6406">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6406">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6407">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6407">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6408">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6408">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6409">이 함수는 해당 `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6409">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6410">From 키워드를 `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6410">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-6411">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6411">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6412">이 함수는 해당 `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6412">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- Slovakia national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6459">슬로바키아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6459">Slovakia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-6460">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6460">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6461">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6461">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6462">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 한 자리 숫자 또는 문자 다음에 일곱 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6462">One digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6463">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6463">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6464">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6464">One digit or letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6465">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6465">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6466">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6466">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6467">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6467">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6468">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6468">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6469">정규식이 해당 `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6469">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6470">From 키워드를 `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6470">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6471">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6471">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6472">**Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6472">**Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6477">슬로바키아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6477">Slovakia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-6478">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6478">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6479">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6479">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6480">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6480">10 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6481">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6481">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6482">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6482">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6483">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6483">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6484">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6484">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6485">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6485">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6486">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6486">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6487">정규식이 해당 `Regex_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6487">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6488">From 키워드를 `Keywords_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6488">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6535">슬로베니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6535">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-6536">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6536">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6537">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6537">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6538">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6538">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6539">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6539">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6540">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6540">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6541">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6541">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6542">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6542">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6543">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6543">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6544">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6544">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6545">정규식이 해당 `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6545">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6546">From 키워드를 `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6546">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6548">**Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6548">**Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6562">슬로베니아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6562">Slovenia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-6563">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6563">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6564">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6564">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6565">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6565">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6566">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6566">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6567">지정 된 패턴의 13 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6567">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="18574-6568">생년월일 (DDMMLLL)에 해당 하는 7 자리 숫자 이며 "LLL"은 출생 연도의 마지막 세 자리에 해당 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6568">Seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6569">출생 면적에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6569">Two digits that correspond to the area of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6570">같은 날에 태어난 사용자의 성별 및 일련 번호 조합에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자 (남성는 000-499, 암은 500-999)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6570">Three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6571">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6571">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6572">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6572">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6573">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6573">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6574">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6574">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6575">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6575">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6576">이 함수는 해당 `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6576">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6577">From 키워드를 `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6577">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-6578">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6578">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6579">이 함수는 해당 `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6579">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- Slovenia national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
