## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6607">슬로베니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6607">Slovenia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-6608">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6608">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6609">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6609">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6610">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 7 자리, 두 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6610">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6611">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6611">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6612">2 개 문자와 7 자리 숫자를 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6612">Two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6613">"P" 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6613">The letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6614">대문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6614">One uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6615">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6615">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6616">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6616">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6617">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6617">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6618">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6618">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6619">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6619">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6620">정규식이 해당 `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6620">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6621">From 키워드를 `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6621">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6622">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6622">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6623">**Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6623">**Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6624">여권 번호 슬로베니아어 여권 번호 passport no številka potnega lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6624">passport number slovenian passport number passport no številka potnega lista</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6625">슬로베니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6625">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-6626">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6626">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6627">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6627">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6628">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6628">Eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6629">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6629">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6630">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6630">Eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6631">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6631">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6632">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6632">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6633">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6633">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6634">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6634">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6635">이 함수는 해당 `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6635">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6636">From 키워드를 `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6636">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-6637">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6637">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6638">이 함수는 해당 `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6638">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_nation_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6662">남아프리카 공화국 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6662">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6663">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6663">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6664">공백을 포함할 수 있는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6664">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6665">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6665">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6666">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6666">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6667">생년월일에 해당하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6667">Six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6668">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6668">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6669">1자리 시민권 표시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6669">A single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6670">숫자 "8" 또는 "9" </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6670">The digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6671">체크섬 숫자에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6671">One digit which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6672">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6672">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6673">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6673">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6674">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6674">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6675">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6675">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6676">Func_south_africa_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6676">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6677">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6677">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6678">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6678">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_south_africa_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6680">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6680">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span></span>

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6684">대한민국 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6684">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6685">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6685">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6686">하이픈을 포함하는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6686">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6687">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6687">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6688">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6688">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6689">생년월일에 해당하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6689">Six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6690">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6690">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6691">세기 및 성별에 따라 결정되는 1자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6691">One digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6692">4자리 출생 지역 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6692">Four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6693">앞 번호가 동일한 사람을 구분하기 위해 사용되는 1자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6693">One digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6694">검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6694">A check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6695">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6695">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6696">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6696">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6697">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6697">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6698">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6698">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6699">Func_south_korea_resident_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6699">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6700">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6700">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6701">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6701">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6702">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6702">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6703">Func_south_korea_resident_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6703">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6704">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6704">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6705">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6705">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6706">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6706">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6707">National ID card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6707">National ID card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6708">Citizen's Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6708">Citizen's Registration Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6709">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6709">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6710">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6710">RRN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6711">주민등록번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6711">주민등록번호</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6712">스페인 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6712">Spain driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-6713">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6713">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6714">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6714">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6715">8 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6715">Eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6716">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6716">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6717">8 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6717">Eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6718">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6718">Eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6719">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6719">One digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6720">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6720">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6721">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6721">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6722">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6722">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6723">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6723">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6724">이 함수는 해당 `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6724">The function  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6725">From 키워드를 `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6725">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6762">스페인 국립 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6762">Spain national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-6763">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6763">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6764">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6764">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6765">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6765">Seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6766">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6766">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6767">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6767">Seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6768">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6768">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6769">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6769">One digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6770">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6770">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6771">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6771">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6772">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6772">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6773">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6773">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6774">정규식이 해당 `Regex_spain_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6774">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6775">From 키워드를 `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6775">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Spain national identification number -->
 
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6799">스페인 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6799">Spain passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-6800">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6800">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6801">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6801">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6802">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 문자 및 숫자의 8 자리 또는 9 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6802">An eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6803">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6803">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6804">문자와 숫자의 8 자리 또는 9 자리 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6804">An eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="18574-6805">두 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6805">Two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6806">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6806">One digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6807">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6807">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6808">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6808">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6809">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6809">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6810">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6810">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6811">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6811">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6812">정규식이 해당 `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6812">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6813">From 키워드를 `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6813">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6814">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6814">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6815">**Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6815">**Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6816">여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6816">passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6817">스페인 여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6817">spain passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6818">passport 책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6818">passport book</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6819">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6819">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6820">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6820">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6821">pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6821">libreta pasaporte</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6822">número pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6822">número pasaporte</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6823">españa pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6823">españa pasaporte</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6824">pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6824">pasaporte</span></span>


## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6825">스페인 SSN (사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6825">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-6826">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 ID 중요 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6826">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6827">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6827">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6828">11-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6828">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6829">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6829">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6830">11-12 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6830">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6831">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6831">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6832">정방향 슬래시 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6832">A forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6833">7-8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6833">7-8 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6834">정방향 슬래시 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6834">A forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6835">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6835">Two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6836">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6836">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6837">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6837">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6838">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6838">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6839">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6839">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6840">Func_spanish_social_security_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6840">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6841">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6841">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6842">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6842">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6843">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6843">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6844">스페인 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6844">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-6845">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6845">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6846">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6846">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6847">지정 된 패턴에 7 ~ 8 자리 숫자와 한 가지 또는 두 개의 문자가 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6847">Seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6848">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6848">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6849">스페인 국내 Id 카드가 있는 스페인어 (자연 사용자):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6849">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="18574-6850">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6850">Eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6851">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6851">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-6852">스페인 국가 Id 카드가 없는 상주 하지 않는 Spaniards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6852">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6853">1 개의 대문자 "L" (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6853">One uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6854">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6854">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6855">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6855">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-6856">스페인 국가 Id 카드를 사용 하지 않고 14 년 동안 상주 하는 Spaniards:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6856">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6857">1 개의 대문자 "K" (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6857">One uppercase letter"K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
-  <span data-ttu-id="18574-6858">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6858">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6859">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6859">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-6860">Foreigner의 식별 번호를 사용 하는 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6860">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6861">"X", "Y" 또는 "Z" (대/소문자 구분)의 대문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6861">One uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6862">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6862">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6863">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6863">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-6864">Foreigner의 Id 번호가 없는 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6864">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6865">"M"을 나타내는 대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6865">One uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6866">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6866">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6867">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6867">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6868">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6868">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6869">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6869">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6870">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6870">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6871">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6871">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6872">이 함수는 해당 `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6872">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6873">From 키워드를 `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6873">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-6874">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6874">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6875">이 함수는 해당 `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6875">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6906">SQL Server 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6906">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6907">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6907">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6908">아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 뒤에 오는 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId"입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6908">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6909">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6909">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6910">문자열 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6910">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6911">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6911">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6912">문자열 "Password" 또는 "pwd" (여기에서 "pwd" 앞에 소문자 문자가 오지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6912">The string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" is not preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6913">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6913">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6914">달러 기호 ($), 백분율 기호 (%, 부등호 (>), 기호 (@), 따옴표 ("), 세미콜론 (;), 왼쪽 중괄호 ([) 또는 왼쪽 대괄호 ({))가 아닌 모든 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6914">Any character that is not a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6915">세미콜론 (;), 슬래시 (/) 또는 따옴표 (")가 아닌 7-128 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6915">Any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6916">세미콜론 (;) 또는 따옴표 (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6916">A semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6917">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6917">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6918">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6918">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6919">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6919">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6920">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6920">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6921">정규식 CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6921">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6922">CEP_GlobalFilter의 키워드를 찾을 수 **없습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6922">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter is **not** found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6923">정규식 CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6923">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6924">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6924">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6925">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6925">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6926">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6926">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6927">일부 암호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6927">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6928">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6928">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6929">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6929">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6930">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6930">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6931">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6931">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6932">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6932">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6933">암호나 pwd에 0-2 공백, 등호 (=), 0-2 공백 및 별표 (\*)-----------------------</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6933">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) --OR--</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6934">암호나 pwd 뒤에 다음이 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6934">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="18574-6935">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6935">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="18574-6936">보다 작음 기호 (<)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6936">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="18574-6937">대문자나 소문자, digits, 별표 (\*), 하이픈 (-), 밑줄 (_) 또는 공백 문자인 1-200 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6937">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="18574-6938">보다 큼 기호 (>)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6938">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6939">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6939">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6940">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6940">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6941">극동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6941">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6942">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6942">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6943">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6943">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6944">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6944">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6945">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6945">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6946">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6946">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6947">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6947">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6948">testacs입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6948">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="18574-6949">ccw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6949">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6950">s-int</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6950">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="18574-6951">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6951">net</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6952">스웨덴 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6952">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-6953">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6953">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6954">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6954">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6955">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6955">Ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6956">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6956">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6957">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6957">Ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="18574-6958">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6958">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6959">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6959">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6960">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6960">Four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6961">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6961">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6962">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6962">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6963">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6963">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6964">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6964">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6965">정규식이 해당 `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6965">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6966">From 키워드를 `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6966">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity> 
```

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6982">스웨덴 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6982">Sweden National ID</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-6983">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6983">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6984">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6984">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6985">10 또는 12자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6985">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6986">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6986">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6987">10 또는 12자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6987">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6988">2-4자리 숫자(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6988">2-4 digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6989">YYMMDD 날짜 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6989">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6990">구분 기호 "-" 또는 "+"(선택 사항) 및</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6990">Delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional), plus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6991">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6991">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6992">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6992">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6993">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6993">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6994">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6994">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6995">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6995">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6996">Func_swedish_national_identifier 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6996">The function Func_swedish_national_identifier finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-6997">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6997">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden National ID -->
<Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-6998">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6998">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-6999">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-6999">No</span></span>
   
## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7000">스웨덴 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7000">Sweden passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-7001">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7001">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7002">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7002">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7003">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7003">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7004">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7004">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7005">8자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7005">Eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7006">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7006">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7007">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7007">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7008">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7008">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7009">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7009">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7010">Regex_sweden_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7010">The regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7011">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7011">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="18574-7012">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7012">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="18574-7013">Keyword_sweden_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7013">A keyword from Keyword_sweden_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
<Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7044">스웨덴 주민 등록 번호 또는 이와 동등한 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7044">Sweden social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-7045">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7045">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7046">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7046">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7047">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7047">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7048">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7048">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7049">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7049">12 digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="18574-7050">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 8 자리 숫자 (YYYYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7050">Eight digits that correspond to the birth date (YYYYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7051">일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7051">Three digits that correspond to a serial number where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="18574-7052">일련 번호의 마지막 숫자는 남성에 홀수를 할당 하는 성별과 암의 짝수를 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7052">The last digit in the serial number indicates gender by the assignment of an odd number for male and an even number for female</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="18574-7053">최대 1990의 일련 번호를 사용 하 여 전화를 corresponded 하는 국가 (1947 이전 1947에는 immigrants 앞에 탄생 한 경우)에는 세금 기록에 따라 해당 번호에 대 한 특수 코드 (일반적으로 9 자리 숫자)가 포함 되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7053">Up to 1990, the assignment of serial number corresponded to the county where the bearer of the number was born or (if born before 1947) where he/she had been living, according to tax records, on January 1, 1947, with a special code (usually 9 as the 7th digit) for immigrants</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7054">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7054">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7055">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7055">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7056">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7056">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7057">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7057">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7058">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7058">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7059">이 함수는 해당 `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7059">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7060">From 키워드를 `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7060">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-7061">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7061">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7062">이 함수는 해당 `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7062">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7078">스웨덴 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7078">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-7079">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7079">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7080">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7080">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7081">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 숫자와 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7081">Ten digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7082">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7082">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7083">10 자리 숫자와 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7083">Ten digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7084">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7084">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7085">더하기 기호, 빼기 기호 또는 백슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7085">A plus sign, minus sign, or backslash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7086">다음은 식별 번호를 고유 하 게 만드는 3 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7086">Three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="18574-7087">1990 이전에 실행 된 번호의 경우 일곱째 및 여덟 번째 숫자는 출생 또는 외부에서 태어난 사람의 국가를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7087">For numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="18574-7088">아홉 번째 위치의 숫자는 성별에 대 한 홀수 또는 암도를 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7088">The digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7089">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7089">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7090">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7090">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7091">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7091">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7092">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7092">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7093">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7093">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7094">이 함수는 해당 `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7094">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7095">From 키워드를 `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7095">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="18574-7096">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7096">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7097">이 함수는 해당 `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7097">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7123">SWIFT 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7123">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7124">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7124">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7125">4개의 문자, 5-31개 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7125">Four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7126">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7126">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7127">4개의 문자, 5-31개 문자 또는 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7127">Four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7128">4문자 은행 코드(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7128">Four-letter bank code (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7129">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7129">An optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7130">4-28개 문자 또는 숫자[BBAN(기본 은행 계좌 번호)]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7130">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7131">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7131">An optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7132">1-3개 문자 또는 숫자(BBAN의 나머지)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7132">1-3 letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7133">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7133">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7134">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7134">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7135">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7135">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7136">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7136">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7137">Regex_swift 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7137">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7138">Keyword_swift의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7138">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7172">대만식 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7172">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7173">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7173">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7174">1개의 문자, 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7174">One letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7175">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7175">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7176">1개의 문자, 9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7176">One letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7177">1개 문자(영문, 대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7177">One letter (in English, not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7178">숫자 "1" 또는 "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7178">The digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7179">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7179">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7180">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7180">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7181">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7181">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7182">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7182">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7183">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7183">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7184">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7184">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7185">Keyword_taiwanese_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7185">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7186">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7186">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7192">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7192">身份證號</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7195">身分證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7195">身分證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7196">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7196">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7197">身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7197">身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7198">國民身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7198">國民身分證統一編號</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7200">蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7200">蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7201">簽名或蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7201">簽名或蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7202">簽章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7202">簽章</span></span>   
   
## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7203">대만 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7203">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7204">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7204">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7205">생체 인식 여권 번호: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7205">Biometric passport number: Nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7206">비-생체 인식 여권 번호: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7206">Non-biometric passport number: Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7207">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7207">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-7208">생체 인식 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7208">Biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7209">숫자 "3" </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7209">The digit "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7210">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7210">Eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7211">비-생체 인식 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7211">Non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7212">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7212">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7213">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7213">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7214">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7214">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7215">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7215">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7216">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7216">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7217">정규식 Regex_taiwan_passport 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7217">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7218">Keyword_taiwan_passport에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7218">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7228">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7228">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span></span>
   
## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7229">대만 상주 인증서 (ARC/TARC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7229">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7230">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7230">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7231">10개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7231">10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7232">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7232">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7233">10개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7233">10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7234">2문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7234">Two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7235">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7235">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7236">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7236">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7237">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7237">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7238">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7238">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7239">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7239">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7240">정규식 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7240">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7241">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7241">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7242">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7242">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7243">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7243">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span></span>
