## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7255">태국어 인구 식별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7255">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7256">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7256">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7257">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7257">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7258">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7258">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7259">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7259">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7260">첫 번째 숫자가 0 또는 9가 아님</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7260">First digit is not 0 or 9</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7261">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7261">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7262">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7262">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7263">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7263">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7264">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7264">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7265">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7265">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7266">Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7266">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7267">Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7267">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7268">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7268">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7269">Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7269">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7275">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7275">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7277">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7277">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7278">터키어 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7278">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7279">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7279">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7280">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7280">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7281">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7281">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7282">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7282">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7283">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7283">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7284">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7284">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7285">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7285">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7286">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7286">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7287">Func_Turkish_National_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7287">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7288">Keyword_Turkish_National_Id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7288">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7289">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7289">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7290">Func_Turkish_National_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7290">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7291">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7291">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7292">Keyword_Turkish_National_Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7292">Keyword_Turkish_National_Id</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7297">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7297">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="18574-7298">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7298">driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-7299">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7299">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7300">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7300">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7301">지정된 형식의 18개 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7301">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7302">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7302">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7303">18개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7303">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7304">5개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 문자 대신 숫자 "9" 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7304">Five letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7305">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7305">One digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7306">날짜 형식의 5 자리 숫자 MMDDY 생년월일 (드라이버가 암 인 경우 50이 고 62 51은 01부터 12까지)로 증가 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7306">Five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth (7th character is incremented by 50 if driver is female, i.e. 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7307">2개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 문자 대신 숫자 "9" 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7307">Two letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7308">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7308">Five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7309">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7309">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7310">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7310">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7311">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7311">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7312">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7312">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7313">Func_uk_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7313">The function Func_uk_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7314">Keyword_uk_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7314">A keyword from Keyword_uk_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7315">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7315">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7321">motor cars</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7321">motor cars</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7322">125cc</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7322">125cc</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7325">motorcycles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7325">motorcycles</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7326">photocard licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7326">photocard licence</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7327">learner drivers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7327">learner drivers</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7328">licence holder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7328">licence holder</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7329">licence holders</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7329">licence holders</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7330">driving licences</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7330">driving licences</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7331">driving licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7331">driving licence</span></span>

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7333">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7333">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="18574-7334">electoral 롤 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7334">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7335">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7335">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7336">2개의 문자, 1-4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7336">Two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7337">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7337">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7338">2개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 1-4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7338">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7339">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7339">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7340">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7340">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7341">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7341">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7342">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7342">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7343">Regex_uk_electoral 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7343">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7344">Keyword_uk_electoral의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7344">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7345">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7345">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7349">electoral register</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7349">electoral register</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7350">electoral roll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7350">electoral roll</span></span>

   
## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7351">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7351">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="18574-7352">국가 의료 서비스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7352">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7353">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7353">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7354">공백으로 구분된 10-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7354">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7355">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7355">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7356">10-17자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7356">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7357">3 또는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7357">Either 3 or 10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7358">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7358">A space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7359">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7359">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7360">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7360">A space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7361">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7361">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7362">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7362">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7363">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7363">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7364">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7364">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7365">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7365">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7366">Func_uk_nhs_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7366">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7367">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7367">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="18574-7368">Keyword_uk_nhs_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7368">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="18574-7369">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7369">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="18574-7370">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7370">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7371">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7371">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7389">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7389">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="18574-7390">국가 보험 번호 (NINO)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7390">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-7391">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 Identificaiton 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7391">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identificaiton Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7392">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7392">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7393">공백 또는 대시로 구분 된 7 자 또는 9 자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7393">7 characters or 9 characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7394">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7394">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7395">다음과 같은 두 가지 패턴을 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7395">Two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7396">두 문자 (유효한 NINOs이 접두사의 특정 문자만 사용 하며이 패턴의 유효성 검사는 대/소문자를 구분 하지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7396">Two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7397">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7397">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7398">' A ', ' B ', ' C ' 또는 ' d ' (접두사와 마찬가지로 접미사에서는 특정 문자만 허용 되며 대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7398">Either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7399">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7399">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7400">2 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7400">Two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7401">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7401">A space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7402">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7402">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7403">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7403">A space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7404">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7404">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7405">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7405">A space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7406">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7406">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7407">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7407">A space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7408">' A ', ' B ', ' C ' 또는 ' d ' 중 하나</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7408">Either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7409">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7409">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7410">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7410">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7411">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7411">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7412">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7412">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7413">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7413">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7414">Keyword_uk_nino의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7414">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7415">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7415">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7416">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7416">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7417">Keyword_uk_nino의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7417">No keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NINO -->
<Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7432">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7432">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="18574-7433">세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7433">tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="18574-7434">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7434">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7435">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7435">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7436">UTR (Unique Taxpayer Reference): 공백 및 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7436">Unique Taxpayer Reference (UTR): 10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7437">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7437">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7438">UTR (Unique Taxpayer Reference): 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7438">Unique Taxpayer Reference (UTR): 10 digits</span></span>

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7439">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7439">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7440">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7440">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7441">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7441">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7442">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7442">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7443">이 함수는 해당 `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7443">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7444">From 키워드를 `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7444">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7464">미국 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7464">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7465">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7465">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7466">8-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7466">8-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7467">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7467">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7468">8-17자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7468">8-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7469">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7469">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7470">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7470">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7471">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7471">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7472">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7472">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7473">Regex_usa_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7473">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7474">Keyword_usa_Bank_Account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7474">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7504">미국 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7504">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7505">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7505">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7506">주마다 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7506">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7507">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7507">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7508">주마다 다릅니다(예: 뉴욕).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7508">Depends on the state -- for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7509">Ddd ddd ddd와 같이 9 자리 숫자는 일치 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7509">Nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7510">Ddddddddd와 같은 9 자리 숫자가 일치 하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7510">Nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7511">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7511">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7512">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7512">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7513">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7513">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7514">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7514">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7515">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7515">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7516">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7516">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7517">Keyword_us_drivers_license에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7517">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7518">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7518">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7519">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7519">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7520">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7520">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7521">Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7521">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7522">Keyword_us_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7522">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7620">미국 ITIN (개별 taxpayer 식별 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7620">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7621">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7621">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7622">"9"로 시작되고, "7" 또는 "8"을 4번째 숫자로 포함하고, 경우에 따라 공백이나 대시로 서식이 지정된 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7622">Nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7623">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7623">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7624">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7624">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7625">"9"자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7625">The digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7626">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7626">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7627">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7627">A space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7628">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7628">A "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7629">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7629">A digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7630">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7630">A space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7631">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7631">Four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7632">서식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7632">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7633">"9"자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7633">The digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7634">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7634">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7635">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7635">A "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7636">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7636">Five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7637">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7637">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7638">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7638">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7639">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7639">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7640">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7640">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7641">Func_formatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7641">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7642">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7642">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="18574-7643">Keyword_itin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7643">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="18574-7644">Func_us_address 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 주소를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7644">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="18574-7645">Func_us_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7645">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="18574-7646">Keyword_itin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7646">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7647">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7647">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7648">Func_unformatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7648">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7649">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7649">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="18574-7650">Keyword_itin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7650">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="18574-7651">Func_us_address 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 주소를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7651">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="18574-7652">Func_us_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7652">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
<Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7673">미국 SSN (사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7673">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7674">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7674">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7675">서식 있는 패턴 또는 서식 없는 패턴으로 표시될 수 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7675">9 digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="18574-7676">Mid가 2011 이전에 실행 된 경우 SSN은 특정 범위 내에서 번호의 특정 부분이 유효한 지 확인 하는 강력한 서식을 사용 해야 하지만 검사 값은 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7676">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7677">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7677">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7678">다음의 네 가지 패턴에서 SSNs를 검색 하는 함수는 다음과 같습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7678">Four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7679">Func_ssn는 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정 된 2011 이전 수준의 서식으로 SSNs를 찾습니다 (ddd-dd-dddd 또는 ddd dd dddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7679">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7680">Func_unformatted_ssn는 형식이 지정 되지 않은 2011 이전 형식으로 서식이 지정 된 SSNs를 찾고 (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7680">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7681">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn는 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정 된 post-2011 SSNs를 찾습니다 (ddd-dd-dddd 또는 ddd dd dddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7681">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7682">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn는 형식 없는 2011 SSNs를 찾습니다 (ddddddddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7682">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7683">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7683">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7684">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7684">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7685">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7685">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7686">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7686">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7687">Func_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7687">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7688">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7688">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7689">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7689">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7690">Func_unformatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7690">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7691">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7691">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7692">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7692">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7693">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7693">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7694">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7694">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7695">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 55% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7695">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7696">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7696">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7697">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7697">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7710">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7710">The U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="18574-7711">passport 번호 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7711">passport number sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7712">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7712">Format</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="18574-7718">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7718">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="18574-7719">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7719">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7720">Func_usa_uk_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7720">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="18574-7721">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="18574-7721">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
